GSP28mimslovu:3124: asādhāraṇasya bhāvāntareṣvanusyūtyasambhavādekatra dṛṣṭasya ca tatraiva niruddhatvāditi //161//
GSP28mimslovu:3127: nahyasādhāraṇaṃ vastu pūrvatreha ca vidyate // Msv_5,4.162 //
GSP28mimslovu:3138: liṅgatvaṃ nopapadyata iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3139: nanu tiraścāmasatyeva śabdollekhe 'sādhāraṇarūpadarśināmevānumānaṃ dṛṣṭamato nāvyapadeśyatvādaliṅgatvamata āha---vikalpeti pādatrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:3140: ayamabhiprāya'---- mā nāma tiraścāṃ śabdollekho bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:3143: na hi so 'yamityānārūḍho buddhau dhūmo 'gnerliṅgaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3146: asmanmate 'pi ye 'sādhāraṇātmāno dhūmādayo viśeṣā vikalpyante te 'pyanvayābāvādaliṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3152: kvacidvā dṛṣṭasambandhe sarva' pratyāyako bhavet // Msv_5,4.165 //
GSP28mimslovu:3154: anumānapravṛttestu prāṅmānaṃ tatra nāsti te // Msv_5,4.166 //
GSP28mimslovu:3156: liṅgijñānaṃ ca tadvat syāt trirūpālliṅgato na tat // Msv_5,4.167 //
GSP28mimslovu:3158: yadi tu kasmiṃścidevāsādhāraṇe sāmānyena jñātasambandhe 'nyadarśināpi sāmānyamanumīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3159: evaṃ tarhi sarva eva sarvasya pratyāyako bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:3165: na cānumānapravṛtte' prāk tasmin sāmānyātmani bhavata' kiñcit pramāṇamastyasmākamiva pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimslovu:3169: kācideva hi vāsanodbhūtā kiñcilliṅgākāraṃ vikpamāvirbhāvayantī kiñcidevānumāsaṃvyavahāraṃ pravartayati /
GSP28mimslovu:3175: nāsau lihgasāmānyasya śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantāsata' sambhavatīti kathaṃ vāsanāmātrālliṅgajñānasya sambhava iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3176: tannibandhane liṅgajñāna iṣyamāṇe tadvadeva liṅgijñānopapattarenarthakaṃ trirūpāliṅgator'thadṛganumānamityanumānaprāmāṇyāśrayaṇamityāha---liṅgijñānaṃ ceti //167//
GSP28mimslovu:3179: pramāṇāntaragamyatvāt tatra doṣo na jāyate // Msv_5,4.168 //
GSP28mimslovu:3181: tasya nāto 'dhikaṃ kiñcit prārthanīyaṃ prasajyate // Msv_5,4.169 //
GSP28mimslovu:3183: tatrāpi maulikaṃ liṅgaṃ pratyakṣādeva gamyate // Msv_5,4.170 //
GSP28mimslovu:3185: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca tasyeṣṭamiti dūraṃ na gamyate // Msv_5,4.171 //
GSP28mimslovu:3190: yatra hi vṛṣṭyabhāve meghābhāvo liṅgaṃ nāsāvanumeya',
GSP28mimslovu:3197: pratyakṣā hi deśāntaraprāptirmaulikaṃ mūle bhavaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3200: kṛtakatvaṃ catatra darśanādityevaṃ karmānantarabhāvitayā kṛtakatve sādhyamāne karmaṇo 'pi hetvantarādanumāne 'navasthā bhavedata āha--- liṅgatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3203: tatra ca kārakāviśiṣṭā kriyā tadviśiṣṭaṃ vā kārakamantarabhāvitāṃ viśiṣalliṅgamāpatati /
GSP28mimslovu:3209: pratyakṣatvaṃ ca sāmānye nānyatā hi gatirbhavet // Msv_5,4.173 //
GSP28mimslovu:3211: yadā vastvamtarāpekṣa' sāmānyāṃśa' sa kīrtyate // Msv_5,4.174 //
GSP28mimslovu:3223: evaṃ tāvadanumāsyāsati sāmānyasya vastutve pratyakṣatve ca dausthityamuktam idānīṃ sarvameva pramāṇajātaṃ sāmānyasya
GSP28mimslovu:3226: ato 'vaśyaṃ pramāṇāntarāṇāṃ pratyakṣapūrvakatvameṣṭavyaṃ sāmānyasya ca pratyatvam,
GSP28mimslovu:3228: evaṃ tāvat sāmānyasya pratyakṣatvaṃ vastutā copapāditā idānīṃ viśeṣā eva pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyanta iti ye vadanti tān pratyāha---pratyakṣeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3230: cāvayavavastvantarāpekṣa' sāmānyāṃśo 'smābhi' kīrtyata iti kathaṃ pratyakṣa iti //174//
GSP28mimslovu:3235: te cāpi tāvat sāmānyaṃ yāvat syu' paramāṇava' /
GSP28mimslovu:3236: dvyaṇukasyāpi yadarūpaṃ taddhi sādhāraṇaṃ dvayo' // Msv_5,4.176 //
GSP28mimslovu:3238: na ca pratyakṣatātsaya saṅghāte kevalasya vā // Msv_5,4.177 //
GSP28mimslovu:3241: yadi tu nīlādaya eva viśeṣā iti matam /
GSP28mimslovu:3247: evaṃ ca aparamāṇubhya' prasaṅgo darśayitanya ityāha---te cāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3249: tebhyastu prāk dvyaṇukarūpamapi dvayo' sādhāraṇamityāha--- dvyaṇukasyāpīti //176//
GSP28mimslovu:3251: sa eva na' pratyakṣo bhaviṣyatyata āha---na cāntyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:3254: na cāntyena viśeṣeṇa vyavahāra' kasyacidastīti kiṃ tatpratyakṣatayeti /
GSP28mimslovu:3257: na na' kaparamāṇūnāṃ rūpaṃ sthūle vartamānānāṃ tantūnāmiva paṭe pratyakṣaṃ vibhaktānāṃ veti na kathañcid viśeṣaviṣayatā pratyakṣasyeti //177//
GSP28mimslovu:3258: nanu paramāṇava eva bhinnā' sañcitā gṛhyante na kāryadravyamekam /
GSP28mimslovu:3260: sañcitā eva cānanyavṛttitayā viśeṣāsādhāraṇādipadavācyā iti te pratyakṣā bhaviṣyanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3261: mā nāmaikaikata' paramāṇurakṣagocaro bhavedata āha--- bhedeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:3262: eko hi sarvadā sarveṣāṃ ca bāva' prakāśate na paramāṇubhedā' /
GSP28mimslovu:3263: na ca bhedenāgṛhyamāṇo 'bhedo gṛhyata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:3267: samudāyo na vāpyasti bhavatāṃ na ca sarvadā /
GSP28mimslovu:3279: ye hi sāmānyameva sarvajagatsaṃviditamapalapanti kutasteṣāṃ samudāyo nāmārthāntaraṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:3281: api ca sarvadā sarve caikaṃ dravyamavabudhyatnate kathaṃ tadanyathā bhaviṣyatītyāha--- na ca sarvadeti //179//
GSP28mimslovu:3283: na hi nānājātīyeṣu vṛkṣaghaṭaloṣṭeṣu kasyacit samudāyabuddhirasti /
GSP28mimslovu:3286: nanu nānekāvayavavṛttyanusandhānena vinā tatsāmānyarūpaṃ dravyamabhyupagantuṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:3291_0: tathāpi tadekarūpaṃ tāvannirvikalpakenāpi gṛhyata eveti nāpahnotuṃ śakyata iti vyāsajyavṛttyavayavisāmānyanyāyena
GSP28mimslovu:3292: tadapi sāmānyamityena rūpeṇāgrāhyaṃ vastuta' sāmānyameva gṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3295: ato naivaṃ vācyam--- astvavayavisāmānysaya svalakṣaṇāparanāmna indriyairgrahaṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:3303: yo 'pahanute śaśasyāpi so 'bhāvaṃ śṛṅgato vadet // Msv_5,4.184 //
GSP28mimslovu:3307: sarvasya hi sunipuṇaṃ nirūpyamāṇasya rūpāde' sāmānyarūpatvād,
GSP28mimslovu:3309: svattraṃ paramāṇusañcayamātrasya cānupalambhād dravyāpalāpe ca pratyakṣavirodhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:3310: ato 'vayavisāmānyaṃ tatsamavetāni ca gotvādisāmānyāni sarvāṇyeva pratyakṣāṇi na viśeṣā eveti tātparyam /
GSP28mimslovu:3320: na ca sthūlaṃ hitvā paramāṇava evākṣajāyāṃ buddhau bhāsante,
GSP28mimslovu:3325: pratyakṣaṃ tu sthūlamadṛśyai' paramāṇubhi' nihanuvānasya śaśo 'pi tadviṣāṇadhiyā nihnotavya' prāpta ityāha---samūharūpamiti //184//
GSP28mimslovu:3329: tasmād yad gṛhyate vastu yena rūpeṇa sarvadā /
GSP28mimslovu:3332: tasmādasādhāraṇam akṣagamyaṃ vadan na sāmānyamapahanuvīta // Msv_5,4.187 //
GSP28mimslovu:3333: sāmānyarūpeṇa na gṛhyate cet kiṃ vāstyasādhāraṇabuddhiratra /
GSP28mimslovu:3336: na hyatra kalpanālāghavena pratyakṣasiddho dharmī paratyāgamarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:3337: siddhe ca tasmistadanuguṇā' paramāṇava iti kena neṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3338: siddhyupāyastu teṣāmanyo nāstīti paramāṇavo nāvaśyamiṣyanta ityuktaṃ bhavati //185//
GSP28mimslovu:3342: ato yadyasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣamityāgraho bhavatāmevamapi na gotvādisāmānyamapratyakṣamiti
GSP28mimslovu:3344: yadi tūcyate pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyamāṇamapi sāmānyaṃ na sāmānyollekhena gṛhyata iti(na)
GSP28mimslovu:3351: yadvastu loka' pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tacchakyata eva vaktum // Msv_5,4.188 //
GSP28mimslovu:3361: evaṃ tarhi dvyākārameva saṃmugdhaṃ vastu loka' pratipadyata iti parīkṣakairubhayathāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti siddhaṃ dvyākāremeva vastu pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3362: siddhaṃ ca sāmānyata' sambandhadarśanamityabhiprāyeṇāha--- yadvastu loka' pratipadyate 'smin dvidhāpi tat śakyata eva vaktumiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3367: atra pratyakṣānumānayoraparīkṣytava ukte śāstrasyāpyaparīkṣyatāpratipādanārthaṃ bhāṣyam---“śāstraṃ śabdavijñānādasannikṛṣṭer'the vijñānam“iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3368_0: nanu vṛttikāramate na parīkṣivyaṃ nimittamiti pratijñāyapratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni
GSP28mimslovu:3368_1: pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ ca śāstramityukte' pratyakṣavyabhicāreṇa parīkṣāmāśaṅkya
GSP28mimslovu:3368_2: tadavyabhicāra ukte 'nantarameva śāstrasyāparīkṣā pratipādyata iti yuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:3373: tathā hi nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti lokāyatikā manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3377: tato mahāviṣayatayā prakṛtvena puruṣārthopayikatvena ca śāstram /
GSP28mimslovu:3378: tadanantaraṃ ca yatra kvacana vācye bahūnāṃ prasiddhamityupamānamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:3382: abhāvapramāṇasya tu bhāvapramāṇābhāva evātmeti taduttara' prastāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:3383: ki punastantrāntareṣvevamimāni pramāṇāni prasiddhānīti prasiddhiprābalyaṃ kathitaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3384: vyutthitāśca tena tena sākṣiṇā pratipāditā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3387: kiṃ śabdād vijñānaṃ śabdasya vā vijñānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3397: yathaiva hi gandhasahakṛtamidandriyaṃ tailād vilīnaṃ ghṛtaṃ vivinakti /
GSP28mimslovu:3406: na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktumito 'pyasya na vācyatā // Msv_5,5.2 //
GSP28mimslovu:3408: aviśiṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭasya na tat śāstrasya lakṣaṇam // Msv_5,5.3 //
GSP28mimslovu:3424: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kimidaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣalakṣamaṃ praṇīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3428: yat punaratitvaritenaiva sāmānyalakṣaṇavasare viśeṣo lakṣyate tadasāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:3429: na hīha pratyakṣādīnāṃ cākṣuṣatvādayo viśeṣā lakṣyante /
GSP28mimslovu:3430: tata' pratyakṣādiṣu sāmānyato vaktumārabdheṣu madhye śabdamātrasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:3434: nirjñātasāmānyalakṣaṇo hi tadviśeṣaṃ bodhayituṃ śakyo netara' /
GSP28mimslovu:3438: śabdavijñānādityādi lakṣaṇamapi lakṣyaviśeṣe na saṅgacchata ityāha---yaccoktamiti //3//
GSP28mimslovu:3445: pravṛttirvā nivṛttirvā tacchāstraṃ na padādyata' // Msv_5,5.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:3446: ityupadeśakaṃ hi nityaṃ vedavākyamanityaṃ tharmaśāstrādikaṃ śāstramucyate na śabdamākṣamiti //4//
GSP28mimslovu:3452: asti hi tatrāpi“vāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāma“iti vidhyuddeśa' /
GSP28mimslovu:3455: nanvarthavādā na tāvat sākṣāt kriyāṃ pratipādayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:3457: trayo 'pi hi tadaṃśā' sādhyaṃ sādhanamitikartavyatā ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3465: taccārthavādā' śaknuvanti kartumiti tat kurvatāmeṣāmasti pravṛttinivṛttyorupayoga' /
GSP28mimslovu:3466: ata' samastāyāṃ tryaṃśapūrṇāyāmeva bhāvanāyāṃ mahāvākyādevasārthavādakāt puruṣa' pravartate nivartate vā na vidhyuddeśamātrāditi sārthavādakameva vākyaṃ śāstramiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3470: ata eva vidhinācina' pratyayamātrasyapadamātrasya vā yajetetyevamādikasya vidhiśrutāvapi kana śāstratvam /
GSP28mimslovu:3472: kathamiva tatra padapratyayayo' śaktirbhaviṣyatīti duradhigamamityāha--- na padādyata iti //6//
GSP28mimslovu:3482: ato yadeva tadupayogi tadeva vācyamityatikramyāpi sāmānyaprakramaṃ viśeṣamevaṃ lakṣitavān /
GSP28mimslovu:3489: yadā hyayaṃ jalpāka iva nānupayuktaṃ bhāṣata iti sthitam,
GSP28mimslovu:3490: tatra yadi lokavākyasthitaṃ śabdalakṣaṇaṃ kathayet tadasya vedaṃ vyācikhyāsārenupayuktaṃ syāditi //8//
GSP28mimslovu:3492: kimiti tarhi pratyakṣādi lakṣyate na hi teṣāṃ vedopayogo dṛśyate ata āha---pratyakṣādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3494: na hi tadantareṇa pura'--- parthamameva svādhyāyagrahaṇakāle varṇamātrādyavadhārayituṃ śakyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3496: ata' purastāt parastācca varṇamātrādita' kṛte pratyakṣādyupayogaṃ matvā tallakṣaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:3507: tasmāt tampayudāhratya sāmānyaṃ lakṣayet sukham // Msv_5,5.11 //
GSP28mimslovu:3511: na caivañjātīyaka' kaścidupayogo gāmānayetyādivākyasthasya śābdalakṣamasyāstīti tadupekṣyaiva śāstragatameva lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītamityāha---yatviti //10//
GSP28mimslovu:3512: yatpunaralakṣite sāmānye na viśeṣo lakṣayituṃ śakyata ityuktaṃ tatpariharati---viśeṣaśceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3515: viśeṣastu sāmānyāvyabhicārīti tasmin lakṣite tadantargataṃ sāmānyaṃ sukhameva lakṣitaṃ bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:3516: yadā hi vidhāyakavijñānādasannikṛṣṭer'the vijñānaṃ śāstramityuktaṃ tadārtād vidhāyakaviśeṣarahitācchabdamātrajñānācchābdamiti śakyamavagantumiti na pṛthagucyata iti //11//
GSP28mimslovu:3525: ayaṃ cādhikārato viśeṣalābho jaimineraṣyanumataścodanāśabdamaviśeṣitaṃ dvitīye sūtre prayuñjānasyetyāha---yathā ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3526: evaṃ hi manyate--- yadyapi codanāśabda' pravartakavākyamātravacana',
GSP28mimslovu:3535_0: yadyapi vṛttikāramatopanyāsāvasare'pratyakṣādīni hi prasiddhāni pramāṇāni tadantargataṃ
GSP28mimslovu:3535_1: śāstram' iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktaṃ tatrāpi viśeṣaśāstrāparīkṣāpratijñānaṃ prakṛtopayogitvābhiprāyeṇaiveti
GSP28mimslovu:3538: kimidānīmaṅgāni mīmāṃsā karmānuśāsanāni ca na sāstrāṇi,
GSP28mimslovu:3544: mīmāṃsādiṣu vedavat tato 'pi vā sātiśayaṃ śāstraśabdopacāramupalabhāmahe /
GSP28mimslovu:3545: api cāyaṃ śāstraśabdo rūḍho vā syād yaugiko vā,
GSP28mimslovu:3563: na punastadupadeśakaṃ śāstrameveti laukikī prasiddhiriha bhāṣyakāreṇānūditā,
GSP28mimslovu:3570: vivakṣādi ca dhūmādau nāstītyetena bhinnatā // Msv_5,5.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:3571: gocaraṃ puruṣaśreyovidhāyakaṃ loke śāstramiti prasiddhaṃ tacchāstram /
GSP28mimslovu:3575: pūrvapramāṇe cottaraṃ vākyārthajñānaṃ phalaṃ tatprāmāṇye ca hānādibuddhiriti viveka iti //14//
GSP28mimslovu:3585: evaṃ hi tairuktam--- śābde hi pūravasaṃskārayukto 'ntyo varṇo,
GSP28mimslovu:3590: teṣāmeva krama' padānāṃ vā vākyatvajātireva vāvayavī vā nirdhūtanikhilavarṇādivibhāga' sphoṭo vā padānyava vā saṃhatyārthamabhidadhati /
GSP28mimslovu:3603: vādinā hi pruyakte prayoge prasaṅgo jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3610: tatra yadā prativādino vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:3612: prativādino vaidharmyeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ bhavati--- yathā kriyāvad dravyamavibhu daṣṭam,
GSP28mimslovu:3625: evamihāpi pareṇābedasādhane ukte dhumādivaidharmyamātreṇa pratyavasthāne vaidharmyasamā nāma jātirāpādyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3630: anvayavyatirekajameva kiñcid vākyavikalpādimad dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śābdam,
GSP28mimslovu:3638: evaṃ hi sādhanamidam--- śābdamanumānād bhinnaṃ tadvaidharmyātaṃ pratyakṣavaditi,
GSP28mimslovu:3643: kiñcid viśeṣaṇamātreṇa tu vaidharmyamaviśiṣṭamarthātmakānānumānānāmiti teṣāmapyanumānād bhedo bhavet na cāsāvāsti,
GSP28mimslovu:3654: vailakṣaṇyamātreṇa tu bhedaṃ vadato vailakṣaṇyavacanasya jātataivāpadyetetyāha---trailakṣaṇyeti //18//
GSP28mimslovu:3655: yadapi cadamaparaṃ śābdānumānayorvailakṣaṇyamuktam--- dhūmādayo hi sāvābhāvikenaiva pratibandhena pratibandhakabuddhimanumāne
GSP28mimslovu:3660: ayamabhiprāya'--- atrāpi yadi kiñcidvaidharmyamātreṇa bheda ucyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3666: ato liṅgamapi parārthaprayoge yameva prati prayujyate tameva pratipādayatīti sāmanam /
GSP28mimslovu:3686: tenaiva vyabhicāra iti nānumānād vyāvṛttirheto' sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:3704: na hi yādṛśe sanniveśe vyāptiravagatā tādṛśasya vyabhicāro dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3711: yadṛcchāśabdāstu hastasaṃjñāditulyāste saṅketānusāreṇārthaṃ bodhayanto 'numānameveti kiṃ tadbhedapratipādaneneti //20//
GSP28mimslovu:3714: na ca tathā śabda ityato bhidyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3719: yādṛśo hi saṅketo yadarthapratipādane puruṣai' kṛta',
GSP28mimslovu:3723: padāni hi svamahimnaivārthaṃ pratipādayanti na puruṣāpekṣayā /
GSP28mimslovu:3736: ayamabhiprāya'--- arthapratipādane tāvadanapekṣameva padaṃ vaidikāni ca vākyāni /
GSP28mimslovu:3737: sambandhānubhavaśca yatheha puruṣāpekṣastathānyatrāpyanumāne 'sau vilakṣaṇo dṛsyata eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:3748: api ca paroktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tairna kṛta ityāha--- uktā ceti //22 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:3765: tadayamanvayo bhavati--- yadyapyāptavādavisaṃvādaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhedānna sambandho 'vagantuṃ śakyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3771: ato bhidyate ityata āha--- na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3772: gavādayastāvat viditasambandhā evārthaṃ pratipādayantīti teṣāṃ durvāramanumānatvam,
GSP28mimslovu:3775: śaknoti hi vaktumitaro 'pi teṣāmanumānatvaṃ sambandhāvadhīnabodhakatvād dhūmādivaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3786: svargaśca niratiśayānandasvabhāvo vaidikavākyaśeṣebhyo 'vagamyata iti tathāvagatayo' sambandhagrahaṇopapattiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:3787: ato yat parairuktaṃ śabdo nānumānaṃ sambandhānapekṣatvādakṣavaditi taddhetorasiddhyā dūṣitamityāha--- sambandheti //25//
GSP28mimslovu:3807: yādṛśaṃ hi darpaṇe bimbamupalabhyate tādṛśameva mukhādi budhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3808: ato 'styatrāpi gamyagamakayo' sādṛśyamiti pratibimbeṣu vartamāno heturanaikāntiko bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:3810: ādarśatejasā hi pratihatena nāyanena tejasā prakāśitaṃ pratyakṣameva mukhamavagamyata iti śabdādhikaraṇe vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3812: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadā hyayaṃ paratyakṣeṣvaṅgulyādiṣvādarśavartinā pratibimbena tādṛktve viditavyāptirbhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:3823: yadapīdamuktam--- śābde hi sakṛduktameva vākyaṃ sahasā nānārthān pratibhāsayati viruddhānaviruddhāṃśca,
GSP28mimslovu:3829: prayogaśca bhavati--- śabdo 'numānād bhinna' ekadā nānārthapratibhāsādakṣavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:3848: heturhi dhūmo 'gnitvamuṣṇatvaṃ dāhakatvamindhanavikāratvaṃ ca ekadaiva pratipādayati /
GSP28mimslovu:3861: bhūyasāṃ caikārthānāṃ vākyānāṃ nānena hetunā bheda' sidhyatītyāha---yatraceti /
GSP28mimslovu:3862: na kevalaṃ viruddhamanekaṃ śabdo na pratipādayati,
GSP28mimslovu:3875: atra prayukta ityevaṃ budhyante hi cirāt kvacit // Msv_5,5.34 //
GSP28mimslovu:3882: bhavati hi dūrād dhūmo 'yamāhosvid dhūlisantāna iti saṃśayānasyāgnivātāvartayoranavasthito vitarka iti //32//
GSP28mimslovu:3883: tathā śabde dṛṣṭāntānabhidhānamapi dhūmādau vyabhicārānna bhedaheturityāha---dṛṣṭānteti /
GSP28mimslovu:3890: tatra yāvadayaṃ śabdo 'muṣminnarthe vṛddhairācarita iti cireṇa praṇidhāya na budhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3892: tadevaṃ tāvad bhedavādibhirna bhedahetava' samyaguktā iti darśitam //34//
GSP28mimslovu:3893: bauddhoktābhedahetunirāso 'pi tairna kṛta ityāha--- paroktā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3915: na ca katavācyamanvayavyatirekajatvāt sambandhapūrvakatvaṃ na bhidyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3917: pūrvaṃ hi sambandhaviśeṣajatvaṃ heturukta' idānīṃ tvavivakṣitaviśeṣaṃ sambandhasāmānyapūrvakatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3924: ayamabhiprāya'--- yadayadaparicchinne pavartate tat tato bhidyate,
GSP28mimslovu:3937: evaṃ hi manyate--- vidyamānopalambhanaṃ pratyakṣamiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:3938: idaṃ tu śābdaṃ trikālārthaviṣayamata' kathaṃ pratyakṣe 'ntarbhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:3941: prayogaśca bhavati--- śābdaṃ pratyakṣād bhinnaṃ tadaparicchinnaviṣayatvād anumānavaditi //38//
GSP28mimslovu:3944: pratyaya' kinnimittor'the vaktṛbuddhe' kuto vasau // Msv_5,5.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:3949: vedavākyānyeva tu mānāntarāviṣayārthāni bhidyante ityavyāpako heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:3956: ata eva śāstrameva vedavākyaṃ bhinnatayā pakṣīkṛtaṃ 'śāstramarthe pravartata'iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3965: na ca śabdādanyannimittamasyopapadyata iti jātamasandagdhamabādhitaṃ ca jñānāntareṇa pramāṇameva puṃvacanajanitaṃ jñānamiti nāsyānāgamatvābyupagamo yukta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:3971: ata' praṅ(?) niścayotpatterjñānābhāva evanti kiṃ nimittaprayatnena /
GSP28mimslovu:3974: tadā tadvākyādeva jñānakāryāt kāraṇabhūtaṃ jñāyamanumāya jñānasyārthāvyabhicāreṇārtho niścīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:3979: na cāsyā' kiñcidavagame kāraṇastīti vakṣyāma iti //39//
GSP28mimslovu:3981: na śabdārthasya sā liṅgaṃ na śabdo 'syā' kathañcana /
GSP28mimslovu:3982: viśeṣo gamyate tābhyāṃ na caitasyānumeyatā // Msv_5,5.40 //
GSP28mimslovu:3991: iha ca vākyasāmānyaṃ jñānasāmānyena vyāptamavagatamiti tatastat sidhyed,
GSP28mimslovu:3996: nanu yatrāpto vākyaṃ prayuṅkte tadeva jñātvā prayuṅkta iti vijñānaviśeṣeṇaiva sambandho 'vagata' /
GSP28mimslovu:3999: na hyanyathā yatra prayuṅkta iti śakyate pratinirdeṣṭum /
GSP28mimslovu:4000: na cārthoparāgamantareṇa jñānasya viśeṣa' sambhavati yo 'numīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4006: yā tu kvacid vyabhicārādaprāmāṇyāśaṅkā sā āptatvādinā nirākriyata ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:4008: ya evamavadhārito bhavati--- nāyamananvitārthāni padāni prayuṅkte,
GSP28mimslovu:4011: kimidānīṃ viditapadapadārthasaṅgati' śrotā puṃvākyādarthaṃ na budhyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4013: jātā tu buddhirasandigdhāviparyastā ca na vaidavākyajanitāyā dhiyo viśiṣyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:4014: śaṅkāmātraṃ tu kathañcid vede 'pi vākyatvādinā bhavatīti na tāvatā tadaprāmāṇyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4020: liṅgaṃ hi śabda evāsya dhūmo 'gneriva kalpate // Msv_5,5.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:4035: nanvarthātmanā tāvadalliṅgenānanumitapūrvamarthaṃ vedo bodhayatīti pramāṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:4042: ayaṃ hi teṣāmabhiprāya'--- codanāprāmāṇyaṃ hi pratijñātaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:4063: lakṣaṇaikatvena tvabheda iṣṭe 'numānalakṣaṇābhāvāt pramāṇāntarānabyupagamāccāprāmāṇyameva vedavacasāmāpadyata ityāha--- lakṣaṇeneti //46//
GSP28mimslovu:4065: puṃvākyānāmanena prakāreṇānumānatvāt prāmāṇyaṃ siddhyati na vedavacasāmiti bhāva' //47//
GSP28mimslovu:4071: nanu pramāṇāntarakasaṅgatārthāni vedaikadeśabhūtāni kṣepiṣṭhādivākyāni dṛṣṭvā itarāṇyapyagnihotrādivākyāni vedatvāt satyārthānyanumāsyante /
GSP28mimslovu:4077: samā loke ca vede ca siddhā vedapramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:4079: nāptasya sambhavo vede loke nāsmāt pramāṇatā // Msv_5,5.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:4080: purastād varṇitaṃ hyetat tasmāt śabdena yā mati' /
GSP28mimslovu:4081: tasyā' svata' pramāṇatvaṃ na cet syāddoṣadarśanam // Msv_5,5.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:4085: ādityaśabdo hi sārupyād gauṇo yūpe vartata iti tatsiddhisūtre vakṣyate,
GSP28mimslovu:4088: api ca prāk svamahimnā vedaprāmāṇyabalenāprāmāṇyānumānāni pratyuktāni /
GSP28mimslovu:4090: ato lakṣaṇabhedenaiva śabdasya pramāṇāntaratve iṣyamāṇe vedā' pramāṇaṃ bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:4094: loke 'pi nāptatvaṃ prāmāṇye kāraṇamityāha--- loka iti //52//
GSP28mimslovu:4097: prāmāṇyaṃ tu sarvasaṃvidāṃ sahajameveti svata'prāmāṇyevāde varṇitamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4102: pade tāvatkṛto yatna' parairityatra varṇyate // Msv_5,5.54 //
GSP28mimslovu:4106: na tāvadanumānaṃ hi yāvat tadviṣayaṃ na tat // Msv_5,5.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:4113: tathāpi parai' padānyudāhṛtya vicāra' kṛta iti tadbhedameva pratipādayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:4123: nanvanumāne vyāptibalena dharmasāmānyamanumīyata ityata āha--- na tāvaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:4124: yāvat tadanumānaṃ tadviṣayaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ na bhavati tāvadanumānameva na bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4128: nanu padamapi viśiṣṭagocaraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā--- ko rājā yātīti pṛṣṭe para' pratibravīti ,
GSP28mimslovu:4135: yatrāpi te pratīyante tatra vyakterviśeṣaṇam // Msv_5,5.58 //
GSP28mimslovu:4137: vākyārthe 'pi padaṃ yatra gomadādi prayujyate // Msv_5,5.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:4139: tāvāneva hi tatrāptho ya' pūrvamavadhārita' // Msv_5,5.60 //
GSP28mimslovu:4140: kiñcit śābde sāmānyādatiriktamavagamyate sa vākyasyaiva viṣaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4151: yatra hi saṅkhyādayo 'vagamyante tatra kathamata āha--- yatrāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4154: dvitvādayastvekatvānna sambhavantīti tadākṣiptāyā vyaktereva viśeṣaṇaṃ saṅkhyādaya iti //58//
GSP28mimslovu:4156: tādarthyena tu kriyāṃ bhāvanāṃ saṅkhyādayo viśiṣanti /
GSP28mimslovu:4158: yathā paśorekatve 'ruṇādiṣu ca vakṣyata ityāha--- padantareti /
GSP28mimslovu:4161: yattarhi vākyārthavṛttiviśiṣṭaviṣayaṃ gomadādipadaṃ tadanumānaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha--- vākyārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4164: siddho hi dharmī kenacid dharmeṇāsiddhena viśiṣṭa' sādhyamāna' pakṣo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4165: iha tu padoñcāraṇāt prāṅ na kiñcit pratipannam /
GSP28mimslovu:4166: uccarite tu pade viśiṣṭa' pratipanna eveti kiṃ sādhyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4172: atha śabdor'thavattvena pakṣa' kasmānna kalpyate // Msv_5,5.62 //
GSP28mimslovu:4174: pakṣe dhūmaviśeṣe ca sāmānyaṃ heturiṣyate // Msv_5,5.63 //
GSP28mimslovu:4177: gṛhītasambandhastu pratipadyamāno vyutpattikālāvagatānana kiñcidadhikaṃ pratyetīti kathamanumānaṃ bhavatīti //60//
GSP28mimslovu:4178: api cātra bhinnayoreva prakṛtipratyayātmano' padabhāgayorbhinnāvevārthopratipannau viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabāvamanubhavata iti siddhaṃ
GSP28mimslovu:4184: gomadādau tu tadasyāstīti viśiṣṭa evārthe taddhita' smaryata iti kuto vaiṣamyam,
GSP28mimslovu:4188: kiñcānumāne svatantragṛhīta eva parvatādirviśeṣya' svatantrasmṛtenāgnyādinā viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭo 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4194: atrāpi śabdasyaiva pranthamāvagatasyārthaviśiṣṭatvena sādhyatvānna kramavyatikramo bhaviṣyatīti //62//
GSP28mimslovu:4196: pratijñārtha' pakṣa' sa ca dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī,
GSP28mimslovu:4199: śabdo hi dharmitayopātta' sa eva heturiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4200: nanu yadā dūrād dhūsyādhāraviśeṣo na lakṣyate tadā dhūmo 'gnimattayā sādhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:4208: kathaṃ vāsya viśiṣṭatvaṃ na tāvad deśakālata' // Msv_5,5.65 //
GSP28mimslovu:4211: dṛśyamāna' pakṣa' pūrvāvagata' sapakṣa' tadanugataṃ ca sāmānyaṃ heturiti pakṣasapakṣahetuvibhāgopapattiriti //63//
GSP28mimslovu:4212: nanvihāpi śabdaviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya śabdatvaṃ hetuṃ vakṣyāma',
GSP28mimslovu:4216: nanvavāntarasāmānyaṃ tarhi gośabdatvaṃ heturbhaviṣyatyata āha--- gośabdatvamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4217: ato 'traikaiva vyaktirarthena viśeṣyāhetutayā cābhidhātavyeti duṣpariharaṃ pratijñārthaikadeśatvamityābhiprāyeṇāha--- vyaktiriti //64//
GSP28mimslovu:4218: nanu vyañjakabhedabhinnaikaiva vyakti' pakṣīkariṣyate ityāha--- bhavediti /
GSP28mimslovu:4222: api ca viśiṣṭatā sambandhe sati bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4223: tadiha kīdṛśor'thaśabdayośabdayo' sambandha ityāha--- kathaṃ veti /
GSP28mimslovu:4229: asti hi sā śabdakāla iti tadetadāśaṅkate--- tatpratītiriti /
GSP28mimslovu:4231: pratītyā viśiṣṭe 'numīyamāne sā tāvat pūrvasiddhā grahītavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:4233: nanu sampratyupalabhyamānaṃ dutādiviśeṣaṃ pakṣīkṛtya tasya pratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭatā sādhyate sapakṣaṃ ca vyutpattikālā
GSP28mimslovu:4236: sāmānyasyaiva śaktve pakṣo hetustathaiva ca // Msv_5,5.67 //
GSP28mimslovu:4238: kathaṃ ca pakṣadharmatvaṃ śabdasyeha nirupyate // Msv_5,5.68 //
GSP28mimslovu:4240: rājā bhartā manuṣyasya tena rājña' sa ucyate // Msv_5,5.69 //
GSP28mimslovu:4243: na pratijñārthaikadeśatā bhaviṣyatyata āha --- na pratyāyaneti ayamabhiprāya' na drutādiviśeṣāṇāṃ deśādinibandhanor'thena sambandho vidyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4246: yathā pakṣīkṛtasya mahato dhūmasyaikadeśe 'dhastādagnirastīti tadviśiṣṭo dhūma' sādhyo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4249: yattu teṣāṃ sāmānyaṃ gośabda' sapratyāyanaśaktiviśiṣṭa' tatra ca pakṣe sa eva pakṣo hetuścetyuktamevetyāha sāmānyasyeti //67//
GSP28mimslovu:4251: evaṃ tāvat śabdo na pakṣa ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:4257: kasyāñcit kriyāyāṃ kartṛtayā sambaddhaṃ kiñcit kasyacit sambandhī bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4263: vṛkṣastiṣṭhati śākhāsu tā vā tatreti tasya tā' /
GSP28mimslovu:4264: deśe 'gnimati dhūmasya kartṛtvaṃ bhavanaṃ prati // Msv_5,5.70 //
GSP28mimslovu:4275: evaṃ saṃyogo 'pi kriyāgarbha evetyāha--- deśa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4276: agnimaddeśe bhavane kartā bhavan dhūmo 'gnimato deśasya saṃyogī bhavatīti//
GSP28mimslovu:4278: kiṇvaṃ hi surāyā bījaṃ surātmake pariṇāme kartṛbhavatsurāyā' kāraṇamityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4280: senākāryaṃ pratipakṣajayamaṃśena kurvan hastī senāyā' sambandhitayocyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4282: na cānirūpitākāra' sambandho 'stīti śakyate vaktumityāha--- na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:4283: na ca sambandhamantareṇa pakṣasya dharma iti vigrahagatā ṣaṣṭhī pakṣadharma iti ca tatpuruṣasamāso vā ghaṭata ityāha---na cāstīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4291: na taddeśādisadbhāvo nābhimukhyādi tasya vā // Msv_5,5.74 //
GSP28mimslovu:4293: tena tadviṣaya' śabda iti dharmatvakalpanā // Msv_5,5.75 //
GSP28mimslovu:4301: na kenāpi prakāreṇa viṣayaviṣayibhāvo ghaṭata ityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4302: yathā na ghaṭate tadetadāha--- na taditi //74//
GSP28mimslovu:4309: tatastavyatirekeṇa pakṣadharmatāyā evapānupapatteritaretarāśrayatvamato neyamapi kalpanā ghaṭata ityāha---gamakatvāditi //77//
GSP28mimslovu:4311: anavagatavācyavācakasambandhā' svarūpātirekeṇa na śabdaṃ kasyacid dharmatayā jānanti /
GSP28mimslovu:4320: na ca dharmī gṛhīto 'tra yena taddharmatā bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:4322: yaścātra kathyate dharmī prameyo 'sya sa eva na' /
GSP28mimslovu:4324: svarūpamātravijñānaṃ tu na dhūmādau pakṣadharmatāyāṃ hetu',
GSP28mimslovu:4327: nanvatrāpyarthena dharmiṇā pratamaṃ vyutpattikāle sambandho 'vagata eva,
GSP28mimslovu:4334: trīṇi hetorlakṣaṇāni pakṣadharmatā sapakṣe sattā vipakṣād vyāvṛtti' /
GSP28mimslovu:4340: arthādanyastāvad dharmī na pramīyata iti bhāva' //82//
GSP28mimslovu:4344: prāk sa cet pakṣadharmatvād gṛhīta' kiṃ tata' param /
GSP28mimslovu:4346: anvayo na ca śabdas prameyena nirūpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4349: na tvevaṃ yatra śabdo 'sti tatrārtho 'stīti niścaya' // Msv_5,5.86 //
GSP28mimslovu:4359: tato gṛhīte tasmin kiṃ parabhāvinā pakṣadharmādijñānena ato nānumānatetyāha---yaścetidvayena //83,84//
GSP28mimslovu:4367: nanu vaibhavācchabdasya nityatvāccārthasya śabdārthayo' śakyate 'nvayo darśayitumityāha--- bhavediti /
GSP28mimslovu:4375: śatakṛtva' prayukte 'pi na ca dṛṣṭārthadhī' kvacit // Msv_5,5.91 //
GSP28mimslovu:4394: anya eva tarhi sambandha' śabdārthayorabhyupagamyata iti //92//
GSP28mimslovu:4399: anvayastu pūrvāvagatapratītisāmarthyānusāreṇaiva jāyamāno nārthagrahītau kāraṇamityāha--- jñāta iti //94//
GSP28mimslovu:4410: yuktā na tu padajñānāt padārtho 'tra pramāyate // Msv_5,5.99 //
GSP28mimslovu:4414: na hyanavagater'the tajjñānena vinā śabdajñānaṃ bhavatīti vyatireka' śakyate 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:4419: evaṃ ca trailakṣaṇyaparityāgenānanumānatvaṃ prasādhya prayogeṇa darśayati---tasmāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:4425: idaṃ ca padasyānumānād bhedapratipādanaṃ prauḍhipradarśanārthamasmābhi' kṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:4429: pratyakṣe ca parokṣe ca jñāte 'jñāte 'pi vā purā // Msv_5,5.100 //
GSP28mimslovu:4433: sambandho na ca tasyārtho yor'tha' sa tvakṣagocara' // Msv_5,5.102 //
GSP28mimslovu:4438: yathā na pramāṇaṃ tathā darśayati--- padamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4440: eṣvartheṣu prayuktasya yathā na prāmāṇyaṃ tathāha--- tatreti //101//
GSP28mimslovu:4442: sambandhajñānameva vā tadā jāyata ityāha--- sambandheti /
GSP28mimslovu:4443: na ca sambandha eva padasya prameya iti vācyam,
GSP28mimslovu:4447: anubhūte tu parokṣe smṛtirityāha--- parokṣa iti //103//
GSP28mimslovu:4448: nanu smṛtimeva janayat pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha--- pramita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4451: kathaṃ puna' pramitaviṣayaṃ na pramāṇamata āha--- paricchedeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4457: pratyabhijñānavat kasmāt smṛte 'pi na kalpyate // Msv_5,5.105 //
GSP28mimslovu:4459: smṛtyā tadanusāreṇa tadā sattve 'sya naiva dhī' // Msv_5,5.106 //
GSP28mimslovu:4461: yadādhikyaṃ bhavet kiñcit tatpadasya na gocara' // Msv_5,5.107 //
GSP28mimslovu:4466: tathāpi tadānīṃ sattāṃ bodhayantī pratyabhijñānavat smṛti' pramāṇaṃ kimiti na bhavatīti //105//
GSP28mimslovu:4469: na tu pratyabhijñānavat tadanīṃ vastu' sattāṃ niścāyayati,
GSP28mimslovu:4472: idaṃ tu pratyutpannakāraṇakaṃ padāt padārthajñānaṃ grahaṇameva,
GSP28mimslovu:4477: ato na padaṃ smārakebhya' sadṛśādṛṣṭādibhyo viśiṣyata ityapramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4479: ata' kathamucyate nādhikyamavagatamyata ityata āha--- yadādhikyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4481: idaṃ cāsmābhi' sauhṛdamātreṇa śiṣyebhya' kathyate na padaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4482: na tu tatpramāṇatve vākyārtho nāgamārtho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4483: tena hi pramāṇenāpi bhavatāvaśyaṃ padārthe bhavitavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4491: sarveṣāṃ ca paroktānāṃ vākyād buddhāvasiddhatā // Msv_5,5.110 //
GSP28mimslovu:4496: evañca darśayitavyaṃ vākyārthabuddharanumānād bhinnā sambandhanubhavādṛte jāyamānatvād akṣabuddhivaditi //109//
GSP28mimslovu:4501: te tāvad bahavo vākyārthabuddhāvasiddhā ityāha--- sarveṣāmiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4514: na ca padāt padārthajñāne vyāpti' kāraṇam /
GSP28mimslovu:4517: yata evaivaṃ vākyārthabuddha' sahārthairadṛṣṭeṣvapi vākyeṣu padārthamātravido jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4518: ato 'syā' sphaṭataramanumānād bhedaṃ paśyanta' saugatāstato 'vatīryāgamasyāmānavyatirekāt vibhyata' padābedavicāraṇāyāmeva kliṣṭā' /
GSP28mimslovu:4532: etāvatāpīha śabdānumānayoraikyamiti vākya pravartata sopahāsamāha --- vākyeṣviti //111//
GSP28mimslovu:4540: avayavārthastvekatra dṛśyamānaṃ sādṛśyaṃ pratiyogyantare dṛśyamānapratiyogisādṛśyaviśiṣṭatayāsannikṛṣṭer'the yāṃ buddhimutpādayati 'etatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'sā'viti,
GSP28mimslovu:4543: na ca vācyaṃ viṣayaviśeṣānupādānāt kathaṃ sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaviṣayā buddhiravagamyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4571: asyārtha'--- prasiddhena gavādinā sādharmyāt sādhyasyāprasiddhasya gavayāde' kañcidanabhijñaṃ prati sādhanaṃ prajñāpanaṃ yādṛśo gaustādṛśo gavaya ici vākyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:4573: tadetatparihāreṇa lakṣaṇāntarapraṇayane kāraṇaṃ vācyamityata āha--- kīdṛgiti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:4580: evaṃ hi naiyāyikānāṃ śābdalakṣaṇam 'āptopadeśa' śabda' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4581: atrāpi cāptapuruṣapratyenaivāparidṛṣṭe gavayādau sādṛśyena sampratyayo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:4584: ata āptasyaivedaṃ vacanamavyabhicārarīti matvā tadabalabhāvī niścayo jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:4589: dhyānādismṛtitulyatvāt sā pramāṇaṃ kathaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,6.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:4594: nanu śābare 'pi hyadṛśadarśanāt sadṛśāntare jñānamupamānamiti varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:4596: yathā hi kiñcid dhyāyata' smaraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:4598: ato na dhyānādijanmanā smṛtyā sahāsyā' kaścid viśeṣa' /
GSP28mimslovu:4602: nanu smṛtisambhinnamapi deśādibhedena jāyamānaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP28mimslovu:4603: evamihāpi gāṃ nagare dṛṣṭavato vane gavayadarśanastadbhānaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavatyata āha---deśakālādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4604: na khalu deśādibheda' sanmātratayā prāmāṇye kāraṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:4607: api tu nagarāvagata' sampratyapi tatstha eva smaryata iti //5//
GSP28mimslovu:4609: yena kilātideśavākyaṃ śrutaṃ yādṛśo gaustādṛśo gavaya iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4610: tasya śrutādideśavākyasya vanaṃ prāptasya yat svayamasau gosadṛśo gavaya iti sādṛśyānurañjitaṃ gavayajñānamidamupamānamiti //6//
GSP28mimslovu:4613: nanu sādṛśyayukter'the na smṛtirnaindriyād gati' // Msv_5,6.7 //
GSP28mimslovu:4632: idamatra vikalpanīyam---- atideśavākyādavagatāt kiñcidadhikamavagamyate na vā,
GSP28mimslovu:4639: tarhi pratyakṣādeva labhyata iti na pramāṇāntarāvakāśa iti //8 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:4640: nanuktamasannihite gavitatsādṛśyasyāpratyakṣātvānna tadviśiṣṭo gavaya' pratyakṣeṇāvagantuṃ śakyata iti sāvakāśaṃ pramāṇāntaramityata āha--- yāvaddhīti /
GSP28mimslovu:4642: tathā ca sādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gavaya iti kathamapratyakṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:4643: pratijāti kṛtsnaparisamāptameva jātivat sādṛśyamityapratyakṣe 'pi gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayapratyakṣamupapadyata eveti bhāva' //9//
GSP28mimslovu:4650: na nām, vastu tattāvat sarvathā tai' pratīyate // Msv_5,6.12 //
GSP28mimslovu:4658: gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭagavayadarśanaṃ cedupamānamabhimataṃ tadāśrutatadvākyānāmapi nagare gāṃ dṛṣṭavatāṃ vane gavayaṃ paśyatāmastyeveti mandaṃ viśeṣaṇaphalamiti //11//
GSP28mimslovu:4666: vivṛtaṃ ca---“yathā gauriva gavaya ityukte gavā samānārthamindriyasannikarṣādupalabhamāno 'sya gavayaśabda' saṃjñeti saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhaṃ pratipadyata' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4667: na cāśrutātideśavākyasya śabdamaviduṣa' samākhyāsambandhapratipatti' sambhavatīti phala
GSP28mimslovu:4675: ati deśavākyādeva gosādṛśyena gavayaśabdavācyer'thevadhārite vyaktirūpeṇānavagato 'pi śabdārthasambandho 'vagata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4679: nanu jñātasyāpi sambandhasya pratyabhijñāne prāmāṇyamavihatamevāta āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:4686: āha ca--- 'gṛhīte 'pi deśādibhedabhinne puna' pramāpratyabhijñānumānātsāt pratyakṣavadavadhārite 'pī'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:4691: na brūma' parokṣaṃ na pratyabhijñāyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:4696: ata eva 'na cāsye'ti sambandhasya pratyabhijñānaviṣayatvaṃ nirākaroti /
GSP28mimslovu:4701: śrutaśabdollisvatamidaṃ gavayajñānamato na pratyakṣasya viṣaya isyupamānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śabdeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4705: jātyādivat tadā tena sādṛśyaṃ kiṃ na mīyate // Msv_5,6.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:4708_0: nusāri jñānaṃ śabdaśaktiparāmarśajameveti pratyakṣameveti varṇitamityato naikatrāpi
GSP28mimslovu:4708_1: lakṣaṇe upamānasya prameyamadhikaṃ paśyāma iti vācyamasyāpūrvaṃ prameyamityupasaṃharati--- tasmāditi //15 //
GSP28mimslovu:4709: yadi tūcyate--- pratiyogisāpekṣaṃ sādṛśyagrahaṇam ato na pratyakṣam,
GSP28mimslovu:4712: ata' pratyakṣe 'pi dharmiṇi parokṣameva sādṛśyamiti na tadviśiṣṭasya pratyakṣatvamiti sāvakāśamupamānamityata āha---vyavasāyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:4715: ato jātyādivatsādṛśyamapi teṣāṃ kiṃ na pratyakṣema pramīyata iti //16//
GSP28mimslovu:4718: evaṃ tāvat sādṛśyasya vastvantaratvamaṅgīkṛtya tatpratyakṣatayopamānasya viṣayābhāvenāprāmāṇyamuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:4722: ayaṃ ca teṣāmabhiprāya'--- sādṛśyaṃ hi na tāvadāśrayebhyo bhinnamupalambhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4725: na tāvat kārtsnyena vṛttamanyatrāpi tathaiva vartata iti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:4730: na hi navasu dravyeṣu caturviśatyāṃ guṇeṣu pañcasu vā karmasu sādṛśyamantargataṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:4761: kintu tattvāntaramevedaṃ dravyajātiguṇakarmabhyo vyatiriktaṃ guṇabhedo vā /
GSP28mimslovu:4765: evaṃ copapanno bhavati sadṛśasambhāvanameva tatra vidhyartha' śyenaciñcodanārtha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4767: yadi cāvayavasāmānyāni sādṛśyamiṣyante tatasteṣāmihābhāvāt sādṛśyamapi du' sampādanamiti so 'nārabhyor'tha' pratijñāto bhavet 'śyenacitaṃ cinvīte'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:4770: tattvāntare hi sādṛśye gāmanapekṣyāpi gavayaṃ sadṛśamiti jānīyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4771: tatra hi tanniravaśeṣameva sādṛśyaṃ parisamāptamiti kimanyadapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:4772: kathamanapekṣite gavi tatsādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'vagamyata iti cet kasatsya gavā sambandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:4775: api ca samavetaṃ nāma tatsādṛśyaṃ gavayagatasādṛśyagrahaṇe 'pi kimityapekṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4781: tathedaṃ gavi gavayasādṛśyamiti na tadapekṣāheturupalabhyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4795: idaṃ ca na syādarthāntaratve sādṛśyasya sarvatra tāvattvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:4804: ata' kalpanāmātrakalpitaṃ dvicandrālātacakrādivad bhrāntikaraṇaṃ sādṛśyaṃ na prāmāṇikamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4805: prameyābhāvādapi nopamānāṅgamanyad vā sadṛśye pramāṇamityāpekṣa iti //17//
GSP28mimslovu:4816: asyārtha'--- bhūyobhiravayavasāmānyairyo jātyantarasya yoga' tat sādṛśyam /
GSP28mimslovu:4821: etena yaduktaṃ citrādau kathaṃ sādṛśyamiti tat parihṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:4830: ato 'sya guṇasya sato gumakarmaṇoranupapanna eva samavāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:4831: atha dravyasamavetameva guṇakarmaṇī api sadṛśatayā bodhayati,
GSP28mimslovu:4838: na ca gandhādisadṛśaṃ dravyamiti ato 'vayavasāmānyameva sādṛśyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4855: ata ekaikatrāpi svarūpamātreṇa sāmānyāni gamyanta eva /
GSP28mimslovu:4862: samavāyātmā ca nāpratisaṃhite jātyantare 'bhivyakto bhavatīti yuktaiva tadapekṣā /
GSP28mimslovu:4864: na hi devadattasya pitṛtvaṃ putrāpekṣā pratīyata iti, tadavastu /
GSP28mimslovu:4879: vināpi tu tāni tatra tatra sadṛśabodho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:4882: yadeva tu kiñcid guṇādisāmānyaṃ sadṛśadhiyamupajanayati tadeva sādṛśyamato nātraikarūpyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:4891: evaṃ hyāha--- 'prajāpatirmukhatastrivṛtaṃ chandasāṃ niramimīta agniṃ devatānāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ manuṣyāṇāmi'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:4897: na dharmā eva sādṛśyaṃ bhūyastā vā tadāśrayā /
GSP28mimslovu:4905: śaktisādṛśyaṃ tu bhīmo malla iti loke,
GSP28mimslovu:4910: uktaṃ ca---“somasya yoṃ'śa' parāpatat sa pūtīko 'bhavad” iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4911: svadharmasādṛśyaṃ kecit triśikhā' kecit pañcaśikhā iti loke triśikhādīnāmanyonyasādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:4912: vede ca vasiṣṭhātryādīnāṃ narāśaṃso dvitīya' prayāja iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4915: ete ca jātyādaya ekaikaśo dviśastriśa' samastaśaśca samānā bhavanta' sādṛśyasya vicitratāmāpādayantīti //20//
GSP28mimslovu:4916: nanu yatra sādṛśyaṃ samavaiti tatsadṛśabuddhyā gṛhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:4918: tāni tarhyavayaveṣu samavayantīti teṣveva sadṛśadhiyaṃ janayeyu' /
GSP28mimslovu:4921: kathaṃ jātyantare sadṛśabuddhirata āha---na dharmā iti /
GSP28mimslovu:4923: ata eva hetorna dhmākhyāvayavasāmānyāni tadabhūyastā vā sādṛśyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:4925: yadeva hi teṣāṃ bhūyastayā yuktaṃ jātyantaraṃ gavayādi vyaktyantaraṃ vāgneyasauryādi,
GSP28mimslovu:4938: tena sarvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ nityatvena prakalpyate // Msv_5,6.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:4940: jātyantarasyeti yāvacchrutagrāhiṇa' paricodanamidam--- yadi jātyantarasya bhūyo 'vayavasāmānyayogata' sādṛśyaṃ kataṃ yamayorvyaktisādṛśyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:4943: yatraivaṃ sādṛśyaṃ dṛśyate jātau vyaktau vā,
GSP28mimslovu:4969: tāni vyastāni santyevaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi kvacit kvacit // Msv_5,6.26 //
GSP28mimslovu:4973: tata' paraṃ tu sāmānyaṃ bhavet sādṛśyavarjitam // Msv_5,6.28 //
GSP28mimslovu:4981: api tu pratyakṣe 'pi kvacidarthe tānyupalabhyanta evetyāha---tānīti //26//
GSP28mimslovu:4983: tadavayavānāṃ tu kathaṃ sāhaśyaṃ bhaviṣyatyata āha---anyatheti /
GSP28mimslovu:4984: dvedhā hyanupapannam--- kiñcidanupapannameva yanna kathañcidupapādayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28mimslovu:4987: yattu kalpite ksmiṃścidupapadyate anyathā nopapadyate tadupapattiranyakalpamanayāvasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5005: sāhitye tu pramāṇaṃ ca tayoranyanna vidyate // Msv_5,7.31 //
GSP28mimslovu:5007: tathā na kalpyate taccet sāhityaṃ na pratīyate // Msv_5,7.32 //
GSP28mimslovu:5017: sa cehāpyaviśiṣṭa iti na kaścid doṣor'thāpattāvasmākaṃ pratibhātīti //29//
GSP28mimslovu:5018: nanu gṛhābhāvo nāntareṇa bahirbhāvamupapadyate ato nāntarīyaka',
GSP28mimslovu:5023: na ceha nāntareṇa bahirbhāvaṃ gṛhābhāvo bhavatīti prāgavagatam,
GSP28mimslovu:5024: tadaiva hyarthāpattyā bahirbhāvaṃ parikalpyāyamanena vinā na bhavatītyavinābhāvitā kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5025: ata' sā svarūpasatyapi na pūrvamavagateti na jñānotpattau kāraṇamiti //30//
GSP28mimslovu:5038: yadaikasminnayaṃ deśe na tadānyatra vidyate // Msv_5,7.34 //
GSP28mimslovu:5044: evaṃ cākalpymāne 'nyatarasya sambnadhino 'gṛhītatvāt sāhityapratītireva na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5045: ata' sāhityārthamarthāpattirarthanīyeti siddhaṃ pramāṇāntaramityabhiprāyeṇāha--- pramāṇaṃ ceti pratīyate 'ntena /
GSP28mimslovu:5049: tathā viditasambandhācca gṛhābhāvād bahirbhāvānumānamityāśaṅkate tāvat--- gṛhadvārīti //
GSP28mimslovu:5055: eṣo 'pi ca prakāro naikatra bhāvena sarvatrābhāvāvagame sambhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5058: nanvevaṃ tadāvagataṃ yadāyamekatra bhavati tadā paratra tatsamīpe na bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5068: taddeśāgamanāt sā hi dūrastheṣvasti satsvapi // Msv_5,7.37 //
GSP28mimslovu:5069: gatvā gatvā tu tān deśān yadyartho nopalabhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5072: taddeśāgamanāt spaṣṭo vyatireko na sidhyati // Msv_5,7.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:5074: evamekatra san sarvatra nopalabhyata iti sarvatraiva nāstīti śakyamavagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:5076: darśanaṃ hi kāryaṃ svakāraṇarthendriyasannikarṣādyapekṣamāṇamekatra sato na sarvatra sambhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5082: kimiti na pratīyate ata āha--- taddeśeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5084: dūrastheṣu tvayogyatvādeva satsvapyanupalabdhi' sambhavatīti nābhāvaniścaya iti //37//
GSP28mimslovu:5090: na ca sarve vipakṣā gatvopalabdhuṃ śakyante,
GSP28mimslovu:5094: agnyādyabhāve ye vyatirekiṇo dhūmādayasteṣāmagnyādyabhāvadeśāgamanād vyatireko na sidhyatīti //39//
GSP28mimslovu:5103: vyatirakepradhānavādino hi bauddhasyāsati vipakṣād vyatirekagrahaṇe na heturgamako bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5110: sa ca vipakṣādarśanamātreṇa dvitraireva darśanai' sidhyatīti //
GSP28mimslovu:5114: evaṃ tarhīhāpi caitrābhāvasya jagadavartina ekadeśabhāvena sambandha upapadyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:5115: atrāpi hyekatra caitre bhavati katipayeṣu tadabhāvo dṛṣṭa eva,
GSP28mimslovu:5123: avagate hi sāhitye bhavati śaṅkā--- kimayamaupādhika' saṃsargo dhūmasyāgninā saha āhosvit sahaja eveti,
GSP28mimslovu:5144: sa hi prathamamanvicchato vipakṣadeśānāmanantatvād durlabho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5145: svabhāvaniyame tu jñāte svabhāvasyāvyabhicārāt sulabho vyatireka' /
GSP28mimslovu:5146: na hi svābhāvikamuṣṇatvamantareṇa kvacit kadācidagnirbhavatīti kaścidāśaṅkate /
GSP28mimslovu:5163: tathātu taṃ gṛhītvāsāhityagrahaṇapura' saraṃ yadyanumānamiṣyate tadarthāpattipūrvakam,
GSP28mimslovu:5166: tasyānyathā na siddhi' syādityanyeṣvasya nāstitā // Msv_5,7.46 //
GSP28mimslovu:5170: yastu vadati--- svātmanastāvadekatra sata' sarvatrābhāvena sambandho dṛṣṭa' ato 'nyasyāpyanuminotīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5171: sa vaktavya' svātmana eva sarvatrāsattā kathamavagamyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5176: atha tatra sato dūrasthatvameva na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5179: yo hi yatra bhavati tasya sahaivādhāreṇātmopalabdhiyogyo bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5184: tatra ca viruddhāvyabhicāritoktaiva--- deśāntarāṇi vimatipadāni caitravanti caitravaddeśasamīpavyatiriktadeśatvāccaitravaddeśavaditi /
GSP28mimslovu:5185: yatra ca pratihetunā sandeha' kriyate tatra balavatānyena sarvatrābhāvena samartham /
GSP28mimslovu:5199: na ca yathāvayavī svāvayaveṣu vartate tathā deśāntare vartitumarhati /
GSP28mimslovu:5200: yadi hi tasyānyatra bhāgā' bhaveyu' iha kṛtsno nopalabhyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:5211: dṛṣṭvā sambandhitāṃ caiṣā śaktirgamyeta nānyathā // Msv_5,7.48 //
GSP28mimslovu:5213: arthāpatte' pramāṇatvaṃ trailakṣaṇyād vinā bhavet // Msv_5,7.49 //
GSP28mimslovu:5214: ato 'syana kathañcidekatra sato 'nyatra sattvamupapadyata ityanyatrābhāvamantarbhāvya kṛtsnabodha' samarthyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5217: bhāvānumānenaiva kevalaṃ tu durbale pratighātahetau tadabādhenaivārthāpattirātmānaṃ labhate /
GSP28mimslovu:5222: pratyakṣapūrvikāyā bhedamidānīṃ darśayituṃ tatpratijñānaṃ tāvadāha--- yatra ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:5223: yatrāpi dāhādikāryadarśanādagnyāde' kāraṇasya śaktirastīti kalpyate tatrāpyarthāpattireva prathamā /
GSP28mimslovu:5225: bhāṣyodāhṛtatvāccābhāvapūrvikāyā eva prathamamanumānād bhedo varṇita iti //46,47//
GSP28mimslovu:5227: evaṃ hi manyante--- dvividhamanumānaṃ dṛṣṭasvalakṣaṇaviṣayamadṛṣṭasvalakṣamaviṣayaṃ ca saṃyogavibhāgādibhya iva kriyādyanumānam /
GSP28mimslovu:5228: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇena sāmānyato jñātasambandhamiti tatastatpratītiranumānabhevedamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5230: yena hyekadā bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa' so 'nyadā tathāvidhādeva punaranupalabhamāna' svabhāvānumānena janayitavyo 'nenāṅkura ityanumimāna evātrā śaṅkate kathamaṅkuro na jāyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5231: tata' kalpayati--- asti kaścid bījasamavāyī śaktibhedo yadvaśāt prāk kāryamāsīdadya ca nāstīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5233: api ca sambandhagrahaṇādhīnameva sarvamanumānaṃ na tadagṛhītayo' sambandhino' sambhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5238: pīno divā na bhuṅkte cetyevamādivaca' śrutau // Msv_5,7.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:5242: ata eva ca na tadvato 'pi grahaṇaṃ sambhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5248: satyam, kintu śaktikakalpanayā vinā kāraṇākhyaiva na nivartate /
GSP28mimslovu:5249: aṅkuro hi bījabhāvabhāvī vyabhicaritabhāvāntaraśca bījakāraṇaka ityavagata' satyapi tu bīje 'jāyamānastadapi vyabhicaratīti kāraṇāvagatirevāvasīdati,
GSP28mimslovu:5251: kḷptāyāṃ ca śaktau kāraṇasambandhinyāmarthāpattyā yadi sambandho 'vagamyate tadastu siddhāntavacchaktisiddhāvarthāpatti' pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5254: jayo hi parājayena viditavyāptiriti tamekatra ghātake nakule dṛṣṭvā pratipakṣasya parājayo 'vagamyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5264: so 'vaidika' prasajyeta yadyeṣā bhidyate tata' // Msv_5,7.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:5268: na hyanekārthatā yuktā vākye vācakatā tathā // Msv_5,7.55 //
GSP28mimslovu:5272: na bhedo yena tadvākyaṃ tasya syāt pratipādakam // Msv_5,7.57 //
GSP28mimslovu:5283: nanu rātryādivākyārtho yadi divāvākyenānabhihita' padārthānvayarūpeṇaiva svārthavad gamayiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5293: pramāṇaṃ tasya vaktavyaṃ pratyakṣādiṣu yad bhavet // Msv_5,7.59 //
GSP28mimslovu:5295: nānumānaṃ na cedaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ tena saha kvacit // Msv_5,7.60 //
GSP28mimslovu:5304: tasyaiva pratyakṣādiṣu madhye pramāṇaṃ nirdhāraṇīyamityāha--- tasyeti //59//
GSP28mimslovu:5305: tatra pratyakṣaṃ tāvanna tatsiddhau pramāṇamityāha---na hīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5306: anumānamapi tena sambaddhasya divāvākyasyādarśanānna sambhavatītyāha--- nānumānamiti //60//
GSP28mimslovu:5307: aviditasambandhe tu divāvākye liṅga iṣyamāṇe 'vyavasthetyāha---yadi tviti //61//
GSP28mimslovu:5308: yadi tūcyate sambandhamevadivāvākyasya rātrivākyenagṛhītvā tatastadanumāsyata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5310: na tuśrutārthāpattivedyāni sarvāṇi lokavedavākyāni sarvai' pratipādakavākyai' sambaddhānyavagatāni /
GSP28mimslovu:5322: nāgṛhīte hi taddharmo gṛhīte nānumeyatā // Msv_5,7.67 //
GSP28mimslovu:5324: kenaciddhi sāmānyātmanā jñātasambandhena viśiṣṭaṃ kiñcidanumīyate na vastusattāmātram /
GSP28mimslovu:5327_0: yataścātra vākyāsvarūpameva prameyamata' parvatādiriva pūrvasiddha' svatantro 'sambaddha'
GSP28mimslovu:5327_1: kenacidagnyādineva svatantreṇa kenacid viśeṣito dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭo nāstītyāha---
GSP28mimslovu:5328: atha śrutameva vākyaṃ dharmitayopādāyāśrutavākyaviśiṣṭatā sādhyate tatastadaprasiddheraprasiddhaviśeṣaṇa' pakṣa ityāha--- atheti //65//
GSP28mimslovu:5329: api ca śrute vākye 'śrutavākyaviśiṣṭe sādhyamāne na tāvat kiñcilliṅgamupalabhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5331: tad yadi tadeva punarliṅgamiṣyate tata' pratijñārthaikadeśitvam,
GSP28mimslovu:5333: dharmadharmibhāvo 'pi divāvākyarātrivākyadayo' śabdārthayoriva nirākārya ityāha--- tadvadeveti /
GSP28mimslovu:5334: yathā tatrārthe dharmiṇyapratipanne na padaṃ taddharma ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:5340: anumāviṣayotthaṃ tu dharmatvaṃ niṣphalaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,7.69 //
GSP28mimslovu:5344: atha tu pakṣadharmatāpratipattyarthaṃ tat prathamamavagatamityucyate tato 'numeyābhāva ityabhiprāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:5347: api ca tatraiva pade varṇitam--- na kriyākārakasambandhādṛte sambandho bhavatīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5351: na cātra viṣayaviṣayibhāvarūpāpi dvayārvākyayo' śabdārthayoriva sambandho bhavati ucyate hi śabdenārtha',
GSP28mimslovu:5352: na tu vākyaṃ vākyāntarasya vācakamityāha--- avācaketi /
GSP28mimslovu:5354: iha tu vākyasyāvācakatvāt tadviṣayatvameva pratyetuṃ na śakyate iti viśeṣa' //68//
GSP28mimslovu:5355: yadi tūcyate pratīyate tāvad divāvākyād rātrivākyam,
GSP28mimslovu:5368: na tu vākyāntareṇaiṣāṃ vinā kiñcinna sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5369: na cāpyanya' prakāro 'sti tena vākyena saṅgatau // Msv_5,7.71 //
GSP28mimslovu:5371: prasaṅgāt tatra dūre 'pi nāsambandhāt pramucyate // Msv_5,7.72 //
GSP28mimslovu:5373: anvayavyatirekau ca pratiṣedhyau pade yathā // Msv_5,7.73 //
GSP28mimslovu:5377: kriyāsāmānyaṃ kārakasāmānyaṃ vā pratipannamalabdhetaretaravyatiṣaṅgamanyathā na sidhyatīti taṃ viśeṣaṃ gamayati,
GSP28mimslovu:5378: yaścāsau viśeṣa' sa eva tu vākyārtha ityucyate iti //70//
GSP28mimslovu:5379: na caiṣa prakāro rātrivākyapratipādane sambhavatītyāha---na tviti /
GSP28mimslovu:5385: atra tāvadevaṃ vākyāntarakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇameva nāstīti tadanādṛtya tāvadanavasthāmāpādayati,
GSP28mimslovu:5386: yadapi kalpitaṃ vākyaṃ tadapi na rātrivākaymavagamayituṃ śaktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5387: na ca tadasambaddhameva tasya gamakamiti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5389: evaṃ yadeva kiñcid vākyaṃ kalpayitumiṣyate tadeva nāsambaddhaṃ gamakamityanavasthāpata iti //72//
GSP28mimslovu:5391: tad varaṃ prathamasyaiva tathāvidhasya gamaktavaṃ kalpatum,
GSP28mimslovu:5395: anvayavyatirekayorapi padavat pratiṣedho darśayitavya ityāha--- anvayeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5401: arthe 'pi caivameva syāt tasmāt pūrveṣvasambhava' // Msv_5,7.75 //
GSP28mimslovu:5403: tadātmalābha eva syād vinā netyetadiṣyate // Msv_5,7.76 //
GSP28mimslovu:5404: etadarthād vinā nāyamityartha' kiṃ na kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5408: na ca jñānānvayo 'satyapi rātrivākyajñāne vyutpannasya divāvākyajñānād,
GSP28mimslovu:5410: evaṃ tāvat pratyakṣānumānāgamairna rātrivākyaṃ pratīyata ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:5411: upamānamapi tatra na pramāṇamiti darśayati---śrutavākyeti tvamantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5412: divāvākyavacca tadarthenāpi na rātrivākyamupamīyata ityāha--- arthasyeti //74//
GSP28mimslovu:5413: yathā ca rātrivākyasya divāvākyatatadarthābhyāmupamānaṃ nirastamevaṃ rātrivākyārthasyāpi tābhyāṃ nirasanīyamityāha--- upamānatveti syādantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5421: ayamabhiprāya'--- pīntavaṃ hi bhojanapratiṣedho vā paraspareṇa pratihanyate tayoścārthakalpanayaivātmalābha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5425: labdhaprayojane vākye paraṃ nāgamikaṃ ca na' // Msv_5,7.78 //
GSP28mimslovu:5428: api ca, yathā parairabhidhīyamāno 'pi padārthānupapattyā gamyamāno vākyārtha āgamārtho bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5431: savikalpako hi śrutārthāpattibodha' savikalpajñānāni ca śabdapura' sarāṇi /
GSP28mimslovu:5432: ata' śabdaparyavasitāyāmarthāpattau śabdādeva sidhyannartho nārthāpatterviṣaya iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5435: tatastayorapi śabdaparyavasāyitaiva bhavet atastatra smṛtistha eva śabdo 'pratyāyaka',
GSP28mimslovu:5437: yathā hi karmendriyamarthenaiva sannikṛṣṭamiti tameva prakāśayati liṅgaṃ cārthena sambaddhamiti ta gamayati,
GSP28mimslovu:5448: ata eva nirvāpamantre 'tideśād vikṛtiṃ gate prākṛtadevatāyā abhāvāt tatpadanivṛttau tasya sthāne sūryāyeti padamūhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5450: hṛdayasyāgne 'vadyati atha jihvāyā atha vakṣasa ityatrāpadyatipadānuṣaṅga' /
GSP28mimslovu:5451: na cārtha evānuṣajyate 'anuṣaṅgo vākyasamāpti' sarveṣu pekṣyate śabdollekhenāpi gṛhyamāṇa',
GSP28mimslovu:5454: yadi tu tatrāpi śabdo 'pekṣyate tiraścāmarthavikalpo na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5455: sa ca nāsti dṛśyeta hi teṣāmapi hitāhitaprāptiparihārārtha' prayatna' /
GSP28mimslovu:5471: ato 'tra vākyasyānupapannasya vākyāntaramevārthavadupapādakaṃ na tvarthamātraṃ śabdamātraṃ vā /
GSP28mimslovu:5472: ata evāgṛhītasambandhasyārthamaviduṣa' śrute 'pyupapādake vākye nānupapannavākyārthajñāne 'nupapatti' śāmyati,
GSP28mimslovu:5479: tu kriyākārakasaṃsarge labdhaprayojanaṃ vākyamiti tata' paramarthāntaramavagamyamānaṃ nāgamikaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5480: na hi prayojanatvāvagatārthānupapattyā yadavagamyate nāsādyata iti yuktaṃ vākyārthasya pūrvāvagatasyāgamārthātvam /
GSP28mimslovu:5482: śrutāgamārthatve yadi pramādāt tannāśo bhavati tato yajurvedādivihitanāśanimittaṃ prāyaścitam,
GSP28mimslovu:5483: itarathā tvavijñātanāśanimittamiti yadyavijñāto bhūrbhuva' sva' svāheti mahāvyāhṛtī' samāhṛtya prāyaścitaṃ samupadiśati /
GSP28mimslovu:5493: pratyakṣasya pramāṇatvaṃ kathaṃ vā saṅgatervinā // Msv_5,7.80 //
GSP28mimslovu:5495: na hi pratyakṣavelāyāṃ sarveṇāsau nirūpyate // Msv_5,7.81 //
GSP28mimslovu:5497: na syādeva pramāṇāṅgamasatā tulya eva sa' // Msv_5,7.82 //
GSP28mimslovu:5498: aprāpyakāriṇī yeṣāṃ cakṣu' śrotre ca te yathā /
GSP28mimslovu:5500: tasmādasattve sattve vā sambandhasya yadeva na' /
GSP28mimslovu:5501: jāyetābhaṅguraṃ jñāna tasyaiva syāt pramāṇatā // Msv_5,7.84 //
GSP28mimslovu:5511: nanvindriyārtasannikarṣajameva pratyakṣamato nākāraṇaṃ prāmāṇye sambandha iti codayati---astīticedantena /
GSP28mimslovu:5520: tenānādṛtyaiva sambaddhamutpannamasandigdhamaviparītaṃ ca deśādibhede 'pi jñānaṃ pramāṇamitayāśrayaṇīyamityāha---tasmāditi /
GSP28mimslovu:5525: bhedābhede visaṃvāda' kṛtastatra ca nirṇaya' // Msv_5,7.85 //
GSP28mimslovu:5526: ṛte yatra ca sambandhād buddhareva na jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5527: tatra kiṃ kriyatāṃ so 'pi prāmāṇye naiva kāraṇam // Msv_5,7.86 //
GSP28mimslovu:5528: smṛtyā śrutiryā parikalpyate 'smin liṅgādibhiryā viniyojikā ca /
GSP28mimslovu:5529: phalādibhiryat paripūraṇaṃ ca sambandhadṛk tatra na kācidasti // Msv_5,7.87 //
GSP28mimslovu:5531: na hi tayā pravartamānānāṃ pravṛtti' pratihanyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5534: tatra cāsmābhi' kṛto nirṇaya ityāha---na cāpīti //85//
GSP28mimslovu:5536: tatra hi buddhirevāsati sambandhajñāne na jāyata iti tadutpattau kāraṇamāśrīyata eva /
GSP28mimslovu:5539: bhūyān khalu vedabhāga' śrutārthāpattipramāṇaka' sa tāmantareṇa na sidhyeta,
GSP28mimslovu:5544: tenaiva caikāṃ na samāmananti sahasrabhāgaṃ tu samāmaneyu' //' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5546: bhramavipralipsānubhavapuṃvākyāntareṣu smṛte' svamūlakāraṇamantareṇānupapattyā śrutireva mūlatayā kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5547_0: tathā liṅgādibhi' svaviniyojikā śrutirupakalpyate---- yathā tāvat prakaraṇāmnāte
GSP28mimslovu:5547_2: sāmānyata' kratūpakārāvagatau viśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ mantraśaktinirīkṣayā yacchaknuyādityupabandhena śakyārtha
GSP28mimslovu:5550: evaṃsvabhāvāpyanumānaśabdaṃ labheta cedasti yathepsitaṃ na' // Msv_5,7.88 //
GSP28mimslovu:5553: yathā barhirmantre 'nena lunīyāditi so 'yaṃ laiṅgiko viniyoga' /
GSP28mimslovu:5554: vākyena tu yathā --- tasminneva mantre dāmītyetat padaṃ lavane śaktamiti tadeva liṅge viniyujyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5563: aśrutaphaletikartavyatākeṣu ca karmasu viśvajitsauryādiṣu pūraṇasamarthā śruti' kalpyate 'viśvajitā yajeta svargakāma'iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5568: na hyatrānupapadyamānasya kalpanīyena sambandha' kenacid dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5574: yadi tu lakṣaṇato bhinnāpi paścādanumānasāmānyādanumānaśabdena vaktumiṣyate tadastu,
GSP28mimslovu:5583: nahi pramāṇābhāvena pramāṇaṃ lakṣyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5586: sarvāṇyapi hi pramāṇānītaretarābhāvarūpāṇi śakyante pramāṇābhāva iti vaditum /
GSP28mimslovu:5589: api ca--- pramāṇaṃ nāma kasyacitprameyasya vyavasthāpakaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5590: tadanena kiṃ vyavasthāpyata iti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5602: yadi matam--- asti tāvannāstīti buddhi' sarvalaukikaparīkṣakāṇāmavivādasiddhā,
GSP28mimslovu:5603: na ca buddheranālambanatvaṃ svāṃśālambanatvaṃ veti vijñānavāde varṇitameva /
GSP28mimslovu:5606: tadidaṃ nāstīti vijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ ghaṭādyabhāva' prameyamiti manyante /
GSP28mimslovu:5619: na hi tat rūpāṇāṃ bhāvenaiva sannikarṣa', nābhāvena /
GSP28mimslovu:5621: yathā svarūpamātradṛṣṭe gṛhādau deśāntaragamane kasyacidabhāvaṃ pratyanuyuktena tadaiva tadabhāvo 'vasīyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5633: asti ca mīmāṃsakānāṃ prasiddhi'--- ṣaṣṭhaṃ kiledaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5637: granthato hi pramāṇābhāva evāvasīyate na pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:5638: nāstītyapyukte prameyābhāvameva laukikā' pratibudhyante na prameya kiñcit /
GSP28mimslovu:5641: siddhasya hi jñānasya pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti vicāraṇā yuktā /
GSP28mimslovu:5645: yadā ghaṭādisahitaṃ tadupalabhyate tadā ghaṭo 'stīti vyavahāra' pravartate /
GSP28mimslovu:5647: na ca vācyaṃ satsvapi sūkṣmeṣu bhāveṣu tanmātrabodho dṛṣṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5652: tatra yā dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabuddhi' saiva ghaṭādernāstitvam /
GSP28mimslovu:5654: ato yeyaṃ sarvavādisiddhā tanmātrabuddhi' saiva nāstīti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5656: ato yatraiva prāk saṃsṛṣṭabuddharāsīt tatraiva vilakṣaṇakāraṇopanipāte tanmātrabuddhireva jāyate na punarghaṭādyabhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:5671: yo yatra na dṛṣṭastasmin punadṛśyamāna evāsatyapyadarśane pracīnābhāvajñānaṃ tadasatyadarśane na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5676: svaprakāśā hi sā phalabhūtā na prakāśāntaramapekṣate /
GSP28mimslovu:5680: bhramavaditi na vidma' kimatra lakṣyate iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5693: yadi granthānuguṇyenāyamartho vyākhyāsyate tato vispaṣṭa' pradeśāntare bhāṣyavirodha',
GSP28mimslovu:5694: evaṃ hi pramāṇagatā saṃkhyā vyavahāraṃ bhinattīti pratijñāmātreṇa pratipakṣanirākaraṇaṃ bhavatīti sāmpratam /
GSP28mimslovu:5701: na pramāṇamātravivakṣayā pramāṇaśabda' api tu kimuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:5708: sa copariṣṭhād dvedhā vyākariṣyate--- ātmano 'pariṇāmo vā nāstīti vā bhāvajñānamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5713: asati hi tasmin pādavihārādivyavahāra' kaṇṭakādyabhāvāvadhāraṇa pura' sara' so 'pyabhāvasyāsati prameyatve na syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5715: satsvapi teṣūpalabhyata iti nāstīti dhiyā gṛhyeta /
GSP28mimslovu:5718: yattūktaṃ tanmātradhīreva ghaṭo nāstīti vyapadiśyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5719: tatra na vidma' kiṃ mātraśabdena vyavacchidyata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5724: itarathā sadātva eva vyāvartayatīti vyavahāro bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:5728: buddhireva viṣaya' na tato 'nya iti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:5732: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti buddhi' pratiṣidhyate tattatra nāstītyucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5733: na ceha ghaṭo nāstīti buddhi' pratiṣidhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5734: buddhigocare hi nāstīti śapabde buddherevābhāva' syāt /
GSP28mimslovu:5737: api caivaṃ sūkṣmasya vastuna' sadasadbhāvau prati jijñāsā na syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:5739: tarhi vastunyupalabdhe ko 'yamapara' saṃśaya' sūkṣmeṣu keśakāṭādiṣu,
GSP28mimslovu:5743: dṛśye pratiyogini tanmātrabodho 'bhāvo nādṛśya iti cet, kiṃ pu(na)
GSP28mimslovu:5749: tad yadā satsvapyaviguṇeṣvindriyādiṣu jijñāsito 'pyartha' prayatnenānviṣṭo na dṛśyate tadā tadabhāvādadarśanamiti kalpyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5752: yaccoktam--- yadabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ tattanmātradhima eva kalpanālāghavādastviti /
GSP28mimslovu:5754: na hi kalpanālāghavaṃ bhavatīti pramāṇāvagatamupekṣituṃ śakyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5755: na ca yadabhāvasya kāraṇaṃ tattanmātradhiya iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:5771: yo na prakāśata iti kathamabhāvaniścayo jāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5774: yaccāpi nivṛtte 'pyadarśane prāṅnāstitvaṃ vyapadiśyate samprati dṛśyamānasyāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:5776: tatra hi samānopalambhayogyeṣu bahuṣu smaryamāṇeṣu yadeko na smaryate,
GSP28mimslovu:5777: tena smṛtinivṛttyā phalata' pratyakṣanivṛttyā tadabāva' pratīyate smṛtyeva bhāvāntarāṇām /
GSP28mimslovu:5784: yatra pañca pramāṇāni sambhavatpratipattīni yathāyathaṃ paṭādervastuna' sattāṃ bodhayituṃ na jāyante,
GSP28mimslovu:5786: tadanena pramāṇaśabdo 'dhikārāt pramāṇapañcake prayukta iti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:5787: vasturūpe na jāyata iti ca svatantrābhāvamātrajñānaṃ na pramāṇamiti darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:5788: laukikapramāṇalakṣaṇakathanācca yatraiva pramāṇānāṃ śaktisambhavastatraiva teṣāmanutpāda' pramāṇamabhāvo 'bhāvāvadhāraṇe /
GSP28mimslovu:5789: tādṛśenaiva hi laukikā nāstīti budhyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5790: bhāṣyasyāpyayamartha'--abhāvo 'pi na laukikā nāstīti budhyanta iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5792: pramāṇābhāvo hyasannikṛṣṭer'the 'bhāvākhye nāstītyanena rūpeṇa prakāśamāne yāṃ buddhimutpādayati sābhāvapramā(ṇa'?) /
GSP28mimslovu:5795: kṣīre dadhyādi yannāsti prāgabhāva' sa ucyate // Msv_5,8.2 //
GSP28mimslovu:5800: kṣīre dadhi bhavedevaṃ dadhni kṣīraṃ ghaṭe paṭa' /
GSP28mimslovu:5801: śaśe śṛṅgaṃ pṛthivyādau caitanyaṃ mūrtarātmani // Msv_5,8.5 //
GSP28mimslovu:5811: yo 'yaṃ kāryakāraṇādinā parasparavivekaścaturdhā darśita' sa vastvaṅkara ityākhyāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5816: asati tvabhāvaprāmāṇye sarva' sarveṇa saṅkīryata ityāha--- kṣīra iti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:5818: yathā kṣīre dadhi evaṃ dadhni kṣīramityartha' /
GSP28mimslovu:5825: apsu gandho rasaścagnau vāyau rūpeṇa tau saha /
GSP28mimslovu:5826: vyomni saṃsparśitā te ca na decasya pramāṇatā // Msv_5,8.6 //
GSP28mimslovu:5830: kāryādīnāmabhāva' ko yo bhāva' kāraṇādinā // Msv_5,8.8 //
GSP28mimslovu:5836: kṣīramānayeti niyukto yat kṣīramevānayati na dadhi,
GSP28mimslovu:5842: na tu ghaṭābhāvo nāmāpara' kaścit buddhau bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:5843: ghaṭo nāstītyapi ghaṭo na pramīyata ityartha',
GSP28mimslovu:5845: ata' sarvopākhyāvirahalakṣaṇa evābhāvo na kiñcit tattvāntaramata āha---na ceti /
GSP28mimslovu:5849: ghaṭo nāstītyapi nāyamartha' ghaṭo na pramīyate iti,
GSP28mimslovu:5850: sannapi hi ghaṭo na pramīyata ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:5851: ata eva ghaṭo 'sti na veti pṛṣṭo 'nirṇītābāvo nāstīti vyapadiśati,
GSP28mimslovu:5854: yaścāyaṃ caturdhā bhedo varṇita' so 'pi sarvopākhyāvirahalakṣaṇe 'bhāve na sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5861: ato na vyāvṛttamupalabhāmaha iti kathaṃ tattvāntaramavasthāpamayāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:5862: tadvyavahārastu nāstīti vikalpaśabdaprayogātmā bhāvāśra eva kathañcidupapādanīya',
GSP28mimslovu:5866: api ca, aviṣayo nāstīti vikalpa' kathaṃ saṃvedyata iti vaktavyam /
GSP28mimslovu:5871: ata evātmani nirvakalpatvāt kalpanā svasaṃvitti pratyakṣāmāha /
GSP28mimslovu:5874: yadi mataṃ--- jātyādivadabhāvavikalpā api samāropitaviṣayā eva,
GSP28mimslovu:5881: vikalpāstukṣaṇikā' svaviṣaye niyatā nānyonyasya viṣayamabhiniviśanta iti kathaṃ pratisāndadhīran /
GSP28mimslovu:5884: ata eva kiṃ punastattvamityapekṣite satastu sadbhāvo 'satasatvasadbhāva iti dvedhaiva tattvavidbhistattvamāśritam /
GSP28mimslovu:5885: api ca--- asatyabhāve kasya hetorāhatasya ghaṭasyānupalambha',
GSP28mimslovu:5890: na hyapracyutaprācyārthakriyārūpasyānupalambhe ghaṭasya kiñcitkāraṇamadhunā paśyāmo yadyasya vināśo nāma kimapi tattvāntaraṃ nāśrīyata iti siddhaṃ tattvāntaramiti /
GSP28mimslovu:5904: tasmād gavādivad vastu prameyatvācca gamyate // Msv_5,8.9 //
GSP28mimslovu:5924: yattvanāhatamanapasāraṃ ca bhāvāntaramabhāvarūpeṇāvagamyate tat kathamasad bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:5925: ata' svahetoreva jāyamāno nityo vā sarvo 'saṅkīrṇasvabhāva eva jāyata iti siddhamasya jātyādivad bhāvadharmatvam /
GSP28mimslovu:5928: abhāva iti sāmānyātmanā prāgabhāvādibedena ca vyāvṛttyātmanā gṛhyamāṇo 'bhāva' sāmānyaviśeṣātmaka',
GSP28mimslovu:5937: asati tu viveke ekaśabdanibandhanabhrama evāyam--- abhāva' sāmānyaviśevātmeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5939: sati hi bādhake bhrāntirupacāro vā kalpyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5945: vastuni jñāyate kaiścidrūpaṃ kiñcit kadācana // Msv_5,8.12 //
GSP28mimslovu:5948: evaṃ tāvat 'vāstītyasyārthasyāsannikṛṣṭasya' iti yadutaktaṃ bhāṣye tad vivṛtam /
GSP28mimslovu:5950: anutpattireva keti cedata āha--- sātmana iti /
GSP28mimslovu:5952: tad yadā ātmā bhūtalādau na ghaṭādijñānātmanā piraṇamati sā tasya pratyakṣādyanutpatti' svarūpāvasthānaṃ pramāṇābhāva ityākhyāyate,
GSP28mimslovu:5958: tarhi sakṛdeva tathā pratibhātagiti kiṃ pramāṇāntareṇāta āha--- svarūpeti /
GSP28mimslovu:5960: tadasminneva dvirūpe kiñcideva kadācit pratīyate na tu sarvātmakameva gṛhītavyamiti niyama iti //12//
GSP28mimslovu:5961: kiṃ puna' kāraṇaṃ dvyātmakasyaikameva rūpaṃ gṛhyate nāparaṃ kiñcidata āha---yasya yatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:5965: ato yadeva sadasatorudbhūtaṃ bhavati tenaiva buddhivyapadeśau bhavata' /
GSP28mimslovu:5976: ayameveti yo hyeṣa bhāve bhavati nirṇaya' /
GSP28mimslovu:5991: na hyapratisaṃhite bhāvāntarābāve saṅkīrṇasvabhāvo na niścetuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6003: na hyapratyakṣa eva viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭa' pratyakṣo bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6005: na ca nāstyeva viśiṣṭā dhīriti vaktavyam,
GSP28mimslovu:6009: na hi rūpādayo bhāvadharmā' svatantrā evāvasīyante /
GSP28mimslovu:6012: bhāvāṃśo 'bhāvāṃśa iti ca vispaṣṭaṃ tadabhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ grahaṇamityāha /
GSP28mimslovu:6021: sa cādhāratantra eveti saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā satīndriyasannikarṣe aindriyajñānagocara eva /
GSP28mimslovu:6026: ata' satyupalabhyamāne tadaiva yannopalabhyate tannāstīti sata eva prakāśakamasato 'pīti na pramāṇavibhāgaṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:6034: atra tu yogyatāsahitā prāptirindriyārthayo' sambandha ityabhiprāya' /
GSP28mimslovu:6041: na hi smṛtyupasthāpitanāmaviśiṣṭo ḍittho na pratyakṣo bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:6043: tasyāgṛhīte hi viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭo nāvagamyate nāpratyakṣe /
GSP28mimslovu:6045: daṇḍinyapi śābde tāvad daṇḍapadopanītaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭa eva pratyayārtho na daṇḍo 'pi /
GSP28mimslovu:6052: dharmayorbheda iṣṭo hi dharmyabhede 'pi na' sthite /
GSP28mimslovu:6077: yadi bhāvābhāvayorekāntaramabheda eva syāt tato bhāvendriyasannikarṣe tadabhinnasyābhāvasyāpi syāt,
GSP28mimslovu:6086: na hyekameva tattvamudbhūtamabhibhūtaṃ ceti pratīyata iti //20//
GSP28mimslovu:6096: ayaṃ ca grāhakabhedanibandhano bhedo rūpādīnāmiti kaiścidiṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6098: evaṃ hi kecid vadanti--- yathā hyekameva mukhaṃ maratakapadmarāgādyupādhibhedād bhinnamiva pratibhāti,
GSP28mimslovu:6099: yathā caika eva puruṣo 'pekṣābhedāt bhinnamiva pratibhāti,
GSP28mimslovu:6107: mukhaṃ hi pramāṇāntarādekarūpamavagataṃ tadupādhibhedād bhidyata iti yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6108: na tvekatve rūpādīnāṃ bhedaheturbhāvābhāvayorapi samāna evetyabhiprāyeṇāha---buddhimātreti /
GSP28mimslovu:6115: nātra vana iva bādhikā buddhirastīti bhāva' /
GSP28mimslovu:6120: yadi tadvadapekṣātra na syād bhedo 'tra naiva hi /
GSP28mimslovu:6128: na hi rūpādaya' sadādirūpeṇa na bhidyanta iti svarūpāpekṣayāpi teṣāṃ bheda' śakyate vārayitum,
GSP28mimslovu:6129: tayā vā bheda iti na sadādyātmanābheda' pratikṣipyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6130: evamabhāvo 'pi bhāvadharmatayā tato bhinno 'pi svarūpāpekṣayābhinna iṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6134: svarūpāpekṣayā rūpādivad bhedānāśrayaṇe bhāvābhāvayoranyataratra na buddhe' sadasadrūpatā bhavedityāha---yaditi //25//
GSP28mimslovu:6136: etena, yadāhu'--- na bhāvād bhedakamabhāvasya rūpamupalabhāmaha iti,
GSP28mimslovu:6140: yanna sambadhyate ghaṭādi tannāstīti pratīyata iti //26//
GSP28mimslovu:6143: na hyasati tadvyāpāre bhāvabuddhivadabhāvabuddhirapi jāyamānā dṛśyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6145: tathāpi tasya rūpādivatsaṃyuktasamavāyena vā tadviśeṣaṇatayā vendriya
GSP28mimslovu:6152: yathā nāsmṛte pratiyoginyabhāvo gṛhyata iti tatsmaraṇārthaṃ prācīnajñānajanmana' saṃskārasyodabodhāpyapekṣita',
GSP28mimslovu:6155: api tu yogyatāsahitā prāptiriti pratyakṣe varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6164: kevalātmamana' sannikarṣādeva bāhyendriyānapekṣaṃ pramāṇābhāvenābhāvajñānaṃ janyata ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP28mimslovu:6169: yo hi gṛhasvarūpemevāvadhārya kvacidgata' pṛcchyate--- tatra caitro 'sti na veti,
GSP28mimslovu:6171: yadi tvindriyādhīnamabāvajñānaṃ bhavet nā sati tadvyāpāre jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6176: na ca tāvātāṃ smaraṇaṃ samprati viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti,
GSP28mimslovu:6178: na hyabhāvatvaṃ nāma sāmānyanyato 'vagato viśeṣeṇa smaryata iti, yuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6181: tastadānīmeva pratiyogismaraṇapura' saramindriyānapekṣamabhāvajñānaṃ jāyata iti manoharamidam /
GSP28mimslovu:6186: bhāvāṃśo nanu liṅgaṃ syāt tadānīṃ nājighṛṇāt // Msv_5,8.29 //
GSP28mimslovu:6188: tasmin pratīyamāne tu nābhāve jāyate mati' // Msv_5,8.30 //
GSP28mimslovu:6191: kvacid bhāve 'pi sadbhāvo jñāto yasya kadācana /
GSP28mimslovu:6201: na hi tasmin gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo grahītuṃ śakyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6204: astu tarhi pratiṣedhādhārabhāvo liṅgamata āha---na caiṣaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6209: na ca bhūtalabhāvasya sarvairabhāvai' sambnadho jñāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6210: tat kathaṃ tataste pratyeṣyanta ityāha--- saheti //31//
GSP28mimslovu:6212: sadbhāvo 'pi yasya ghaṭāde' kadācit jñāta' tasyāpi
GSP28mimslovu:6225: na kevalaṃ yadyatra kadācid dṛṣṭaṃ tanmātrasya tatrābhāvo 'vagamyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6226: yasyāpi tu yatrābhāvo na dṛṣṭapūrvastasyāpi tatrābhāvo 'vagamyata ityāha---yatreti //33//
GSP28mimslovu:6229: na caivamastīti vyatirekeṇa darśayati---gṛhīte 'pi ca bhāvāṃśe naicābhāve 'nyavastuna' /
GSP28mimslovu:6234: tadihābhāvākhye sambandhini grahītavye kiṃ pramāṇamiti vaktavyamityāha--- sambandha iti //36//
GSP28mimslovu:6242: dvedhā hi hetavo bauddhairvibhajyante--- kāryaṃ svabhāva iti,
GSP28mimslovu:6244: tasyāśca svarūpaṃ jñeyarūpaṃ ca prakāśate iti jñānajñeyasvabhāvā /
GSP28mimslovu:6246: tasyāśca svasādhyena nāstīti vikalpaśabdātmakavyavahāreṇa tadyogyatayā vā tādātmyameva pratibandha' /
GSP28mimslovu:6247: na hyasau nāstīti vyavahāraṃ vyabhicarati śiṃśapeva vṛkṣatām /
GSP28mimslovu:6248: tadevaṃ jñātapratibandhānupalabdhi' yo nāma bhrāmyan viviktadeśopalabdhāvapi ghaṭāya ghaṭate taṃ prati nāstīti vyavahāraṃ tadyogyatāṃ vānumāpayati /
GSP28mimslovu:6249: evaṃ ca ghaṭādyabhāvānupalabdhiprayoga'--- yad dṛśyaṃ hi sadyatra nopalabhyate tattatra nāsti /
GSP28mimslovu:6250: nopalabhyate copalabhyamāne deśe dṛśyo ghaṭa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6252: ya evānupalabdhyānumātumiṣyate ghaṭābhāvo nāstīti vyavahārastadyogyatā vā naikenāpi viśeṣeṇānupalabdhe' sambandho 'vagata',
GSP28mimslovu:6255: tasyāśca nānāvidhānekaghaṭapaṭādiviṣayā nāstīti vyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathaṃ viśeṣeṇa ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahārayet /
GSP28mimslovu:6257: ato ghaṭābhāvaṃ tadvyavahāraṃ vā prasādhayatīti cet /
GSP28mimslovu:6261: tacca sarvān pratyaviśiṣṭamiti kathamekenaiva vyapadiśyate ced ghaṭābhāvo nāma kaścit_ /
GSP28mimslovu:6262: kasmācca satyapi ghaṭe ghaṭo nāstīti vyavahāro na pravartate /
GSP28mimslovu:6272: yadasati ghaṭe nāstīti vyavahāro na satīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6273: yaccedaṃ ghaṭābhāvamatilaṅghya nāstīti vyavahārānumānamavasthitaṃ tadapi kena viśeṣeṇeti na vidma' /
GSP28mimslovu:6275: yogyatā tadanatirekiṇī tasmin buddhe buddhaiveti na kiñcidanumeyaṃ paśyāma' /
GSP28mimslovu:6281: vyabhicārādā viśeṣāstu pratīyeran kathaṃ tayā // Msv_5,8.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:6284: sa cānyena grahītavyo nāgṛhīte hi liṅgatā /
GSP28mimslovu:6287: kvāpyasya syāt pramāṇatvaṃ liṅgatvena vinā dhruvam // Msv_5,8.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:6292: viśeṣāstvanaikāntikatayā nānupalabdhyā bodhayituṃ śakyanta ityāha--- vyabhicārāditi //39//
GSP28mimslovu:6293: api ca--- nānavagatarūpaṃ liṅgamanumāne liṅgaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6297: evaṃ ca tatra tatra sadṛśāparāparaliṅgānusāreṇānavasthāpāta ityāha--- na ceti dvayena /
GSP28mimslovu:6300: evaṃ yo 'pyasau liṅgirūpābhāva' so 'pi sambandhagrahaṇārthamavaśyaṃ prathamavagantavya' /
GSP28mimslovu:6303: yadi tu nāstīti buddhireva liṅgamityucyate tanna /
GSP28mimslovu:6316: yadi sā phalaṃ kiṃ tarhi pramāṇata āha--- tasyaiveti /
GSP28mimslovu:6317: yasyaiva sā phalaṃ tadeva pratyakṣādyanutpatte' phalānantaryātpramāṇamiti //43//
GSP28mimslovu:6334: sa ca prāmāṇye kāraṇaṃ na bhāvasvarūpatā /
GSP28mimslovu:6335: sā tu prāmāṇyaṃ pratyaprayojikaiva kathañcitteṣu saṅgatā,
GSP28mimslovu:6339: yathā bhāvātmake meye 'bhāva' pramāṇaṃ nānurūpaṃ tathā tadabhāve bhāva ityāha--- bhāvātmaka iti //46//
GSP28mimslovu:6341: bhāvātmakasya mānatvaṃ na ca rājājñayā sthitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6346: tathā sati ca pūrvokto vyavahāro na sidhyati // Msv_5,8.49 //
GSP28mimslovu:6348: yatrābhāvo 'sti tenāsyā' sambandho naiva vidyate // Msv_5,8.50 //
GSP28mimslovu:6349: yo na sannihitastatra tasya dharmo bhavediyam /
GSP28mimslovu:6350: na ca tasya prameyatvaṃ dharmadharmitvavarjanāt // Msv_5,8.51 //
GSP28mimslovu:6352: yadeva tu paricchedaphalaṃ tadeva tu pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:6355: tathā ca sati bauddhānāmapi liṅga prameyatve na syātām,
GSP28mimslovu:6356: te 'pi hi nāvastuno dṛṣṭe ityāha-- yadīti sārdhena /
GSP28mimslovu:6358: na ca syād vyavahāro 'yamiti kāraṇādivibhāgenokto vyavahāra ityartha' //48,49//
GSP28mimslovu:6363: tacca pūrvavagatamiti taddharmo bhaviṣyatītyata āha--- yatreti /
GSP28mimslovu:6366: ghaṭasya tarhi dharmo bhaviṣyati tadgocare pratyakṣādīnāmanutpatterata āha---yaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6368: yatra pratyakṣādīni notpadyante taddharmatā kathañcid bhavedapi,
GSP28mimslovu:6374: tajjñānād viṣaytavaṃ ca jñāne meyaṃ na vidyate // Msv_5,8.52 //
GSP28mimslovu:6376: nāgṛhīte hi dharmatvaṃ gṛhīte siddhasādhanam // Msv_5,8.53 //
GSP28mimslovu:6380: prameyatvād yathā bhāvastasmād bhāvātmakāt pṛthak // Msv_5,8.55 //
GSP28mimslovu:6381: karmāṇi sarvāṇi phalai' samastai' sarvairyathāvacca yadaṅgakāraṇḍai' /
GSP28mimslovu:6382: na saṅgatānīha parasparaṃ hi nāṅgaṃ tadetatprabhavaṃ kratūnām // Msv_5,8.56 //
GSP28mimslovu:6386: abhāvasya tu sādharmo bhaviṣyati tadviṣayatvāt tasyā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6387: abhāve hi prameye sā liṅgaṃ bhavatyeva /
GSP28mimslovu:6396: evaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ prasādhitaṃ bhedaṃ prayogeṇa darśayati---abhāvaśabdeti //54//
GSP28mimslovu:6404: tato 'dhikaṃ yad dvayamiṣṭamanyairbhedo na tasyetyapi siddhametat // Msv_5,8.57 //
GSP28mimslovu:6405: iha bhavati śatādau sambhavādyā sahasrānmatiraviyutabāvāt sānumānādabhinnā /
GSP28mimslovu:6406: jagati bahu na tathyaṃ nityamaitihyamuktaṃ bhavati tu yadi satyaṃ nāgamād bhidyate tat // Msv_5,8.58 //
GSP28mimslovu:6417: ato yuktyāgamābhyāmiha śābare bhāṣye pramāṇaṣaṭkameva pravivicya tarkitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6420: yā tāvat sahasrācchate mati' sambhavākhyaṃ pramāṇamiṣyate sānumānānna bhidyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6441: asyārtha'--- yadyapi sarvapramāṇāvyabhicārānna pramāṇasāmānayabhāvinā dharmeṇa śabdo 'pi na pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:6443: tathā hi citrayā paśavo bhāvyanta iti citrayā yajetetyasyāratha' /
GSP28mimslovu:6447: kimuktaṃ bhavati--- upalambhanāni hi cakṣurādīni paśūnāṃ vidyante /
GSP28mimslovu:6453: asyārtha' paralokaphalā hi tatra svargakāmo yajetetyevamādicodanā vedabāhyaboddhādiparamatenākṣiptā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6455: nanūbhayīmapi codanāmākṣeptuṃ śakyata eva vākyatvādayo hetava' /
GSP28mimslovu:6456: ta eva tatra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yat kiñcana laukikaṃ vanacam' iti darśayatāntarṇītā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6457: vārtikakṛtāpi---'yadi vā puruṣādhīnaprāmāṇyā' sarvacodanā' iti vivṛtā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6460: ihāpi ca---'evaṃ dṛṣṭāpacārasya vedasya svargādyapi phalaṃ nāstīti manyāmaha' iti sarvākṣepa' kṛta' /
GSP28mimslovu:6480: kathamaparathā'yadāsau vidyamānāsīt tadā palaṃ na dattavatī,
GSP28mimslovu:6481: kālāntare punarasatī kathaṃ dāsyati' iti na ca paśavo 'nantasamabhavadbhāvanā',
GSP28mimslovu:6484: amī puna' paśava' sambhavanti yajamānasyātraiveti svahetusamanantaramanupalabhyamānā dṛṣṭapratigrahādihetvantarā' śrutacitrādiphalatayā na śakyante 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:6485: ayameva tu śabdaśaktiparāmarśo vārtikakṛtā tārkikaprakriyāmanuvidadhānena 'na vā paśuphale'tyādinā sādhanaprayogairupadarśita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6490: yadāmuṣmikasvargādi tanmā nāma karmānantaramupalabhyatāmaihikaphalaṃ tu paśvādi kiṃ nopalabhyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6492: tanna nūnaṃ tat phalamiti aihikaphalakarmacodanāvyabhicāreṇānyāsāmapi paralokaphalānāṃ tatsāmānyādākṣepa' /
GSP28mimslovu:6493: pūrvaṃ tu tā' parata' prāmāṇyamāśritya paroktairaiva vākyatvādibhirhetubhirākṣiptā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6496: ayamabhiprāya'--- codanāsūtre bhāṣyakṛtā sūtrakāreṇa vakṣyamāṇākṣepaparihārāvanāgatāvekṣaṇena pratijñāsamarthanārthabhupavarṇitau /
GSP28mimslovu:6497: idānīṃ tu sūtrakāreṇa svayamevocyata iti tenedameva sarvacodanākṣepakṣetramityuktamiti //1//
GSP28mimslovu:6503: nadītīre phalānīti tatrādṛsyāni tāni cet // Msv_5,9.3 //
GSP28mimslovu:6504: na vā paśuphalā citrā svakāle tadadānata' /
GSP28mimslovu:6505: snānabhujyādivat te 'pi tatsādhyā na bhavanti vā // Msv_5,9.4 //
GSP28mimslovu:6518: prāyeṇa caitrañjātīyakaṃ vipralipsureva prayuṅkta iti vipralipsorityuktamiti //2,3//
GSP28mimslovu:6519: idānīmaihikākṣepa ityuktaṃ vivṛṇoti--- na veti vadantena /
GSP28mimslovu:6529: karmakāle ca karmaphalena bhavitavyam' iti bhāṣyoktau veditavyāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6530: atrānantaraṃ 'yatkālaṃ hi mardanaṃ tatkālameva mardanasukham' iti bhāṣyakāreṇoktam,
GSP28mimslovu:6532: citrā na paśuphalā paśavo na tatsādhyā ityubhayatrāpi prayoge vaidharmyeṇa sukhamardane bhavetām,
GSP28mimslovu:6536: yacca yatsādhyaṃ tat tadutpattau bhavatyeva sukhamiva mardanotpattāviti //4,5//
GSP28mimslovu:6539: na hi kṛte karmaṇi tāvatyeva phalena bhavitavyamiti śabdo brūte,
GSP28mimslovu:6554: yaiva hyasyedaṃ phalamityuktaṃ tadaivamarthādevāvagamyate anantaramanena bhavitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6557: aviśeṣapravṛttā tu codanā kataṃ bādhyate ata āha--- śabdeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6558: na hi sāmarthyaṃ nāma pṛthak pramāṇam,
GSP28mimslovu:6559: api tarhi sarvākhyātānāmarthaṃ bruvatāṃ śakti' sahakāriṇīti śabdaikadeśa eva /
GSP28mimslovu:6560: ata' sruvāvadānamivāpyadravyeṣvarthādanantarameva phalaṃ niścīyata iti tadbodhe 'pi śābdabodho bhavatyeveti //6//
GSP28mimslovu:6562: yadi hyatra phalaṃ dāsyatīti ḷṅśroṣyat tadā tatsāmarthyena kalpanā kācidapyabhaviṣyat /
GSP28mimslovu:6563_0: adya punarasyedaṃ karmaṇa' phalamiti paryavasite vacasi sarvakarmaṇāmanantaraphalopalambhād
GSP28mimslovu:6564: atrānantaramaparaṃ bhāṣyam--- 'dṛṣṭaviruddhamapi kiñcit vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ 'sa eṣa yajñāyudhī yajamāno 'ñjasā svargaṃ lokaṃ yātī'ti /
GSP28mimslovu:6567: uttaratra yajñāyudhivākye pratyakṣādivirodha iti virodhamabhidyotayati--- svargayāna iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6573: śarīdād yadi cānya' syānnāsau yajñāyudhī bhavet /
GSP28mimslovu:6574: na cāsya yajamānatvaṃ sadbhāvo 'pi ca durlabha' // Msv_5,9.10 //
GSP28mimslovu:6575: su tvanantaraphalānupalambhamātraṃ na tu viruddhopalambha' kaścidastīti syādapi kālāntare phalakalpanā,
GSP28mimslovu:6576: bhasmībhūtaṃ tu śarīraṃ kālāntare 'pi svargaṃ lokaṃ yāsyatīti na sambhavatīti pūrvasmād viśeṣa' //8//
GSP28mimslovu:6577: aparamapi ca 'evañjātīyakaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ vacanamapramāṇam--- ambuni majjantyalābūni,
GSP28mimslovu:6578: grāvāṇa' plavanta iti yathā ' iti bhāṣyam,
GSP28mimslovu:6584: yathā grāvāṇa' plavanta iti śilā vākyaṃ sādharmyeṇa yatheti darśayitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6587: pūrvaṃ tu mardanasukhayorvaidharmye dṛṣṭāntaratayopanyāsācchilāvākyamapi vaidharmyeṇa bhāṣyakṛtoktamiti bhrāntimapanetuṃ sādharmyavaidharmyaviveko vārtikakṛtā darśita' //9//
GSP28mimslovu:6589: asti hi paralokaphalabhoktā cetana' karmaṇāṃ kartā,
GSP28mimslovu:6594: bhavedapi na tasya yajñāyudhairasti kaścit sambandhaprakāra',
GSP28mimslovu:6596: yadyajñāyudhī yajamāna iti tadabhiprāyeṇa matvarthasaṃyogo ghaṭate /
GSP28mimslovu:6607: viśeṣo 'syeti bhedena nopāttaṃ syādidaṃ tata' // Msv_5,9.11 //
GSP28mimslovu:6610: phalaṃ ca na bhavedevaṃ bhasmībhāvād vidhāvapi /
GSP28mimslovu:6611: tatsāmarthyena yānyapi kalpanā tāṃ niṣedhati // Msv_5,9.13 //
GSP28mimslovu:6614: paramārthena tu dehendriyavyatiriktātmasadbhāvo 'pi pramāṇābhāvād durlabha ityāha--- sadbhāva iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6615: prapañcayiṣyate caitadātmavāda itīha na pratanyata iti //10//
GSP28mimslovu:6616: aparaṃ ca--- 'na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabda''iti bhāṣyam /
GSP28mimslovu:6620: tadā citrādīnāmanantaraphalādarśanād bhedena virodhopanyāsārthaṃ yajñāyudhivākyopādānaṃ nopapadyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6624: vidhiśabde hi kālaviśeṣānupādānād vidhisāmarthyādeva kālāntarabhāvitāṃ phalasya parikalpya syādapi citrādicodanāsvivābhāvavirodhaparihāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:6625: iha tu yātīti vartamānāpadeśānna pratyakṣavirodha' śakyate parihartumityadarśanād viśeṣa iti //12//
GSP28mimslovu:6626: citrādivākyābhiprāyeṇa cedamasmābhiruktam--- vidhiśabde bhaviṣyattvaṃ phalasya parikalpya virodha' śakyate parihartumiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6627: iha tu pratyakṣeṇa bhasmībhāvopalambhānna kālālantaraphalabhāvitayā svargagamanaṃ phalamiti śakyate kalpayitum /
GSP28mimslovu:6630: takiṃ tarhi vidhiśabdatānirākaraṇasya phalamata āha--- tatsāmarthyeneti /
GSP28mimslovu:6634: mantreṣu ceti te sarve pakṣīkāryā' prayatnata' // Msv_5,9.14 //
GSP28mimslovu:6644: sa ca sarva evātra prayatnato mukhyatayā mithyātvena aihikākṣepe pakṣīkārya',
GSP28mimslovu:6650: ata' kṛtsnasyaiva vedasyāprāmāṇyānna cojanālakṣaṇārtho dharma ityākṣepa'//
GSP28mimslovu:6660: yattu tamadūṣayitvaivānyaducyate tadasaṅgatamevāta āha--- svapakṣa iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6661_1: prāmāṇyaṃ na pratipādyate tāvad dūṣite 'pi sādhane na 'canodanālakṣaṇo dharma' iti pratijñā sidhyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6671: na cātra parasādhanadūṣaṇaṃ na kariṣyate 'tatra hetorasiddhatvam' iti citrāparihāre vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6672: anena tu krameṇa tat kartavyamiti tāvadityuktamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6673: tacca svapakṣasādhanaṃ tārkikāṇāṃ cittamanurañja yituṃ prayogadvāreṇāha---amṛṣeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6677: yat svārthe vaktāraṃ nāpekṣate tat satyam,
