GSP28mimslovu:6679: padaṃ hi svabhāvādeva svārthena sambaddhaṃ tatpratipādanāya vaktāraṃ nāpekṣata iti sambandhaparihāre vakṣyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6682: na hi svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryādityādyarthe svargakāmo yajeteti vākyaṃ samyagiṣyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6684: yāgena svargaṃ kuryāditi hi tatra sthāsyati /
GSP28mimslovu:6705: atraiva sādhye pūrvoktā'--- 'nānyatvāt' iti bhāṣyavyākhyānāvasara uktā'--- doṣavarjitai' kāraṇai' janyamānatvāt,
GSP28mimslovu:6707: deśādibhede 'pi deśādibhede 'pi bādhavarjanāt iti hetavo darśayitavyā ityāha--- atreti //2//
GSP28mimslovu:6712: asyārtha'--- śabdārthasambandhānāṃ nityatvamāśrityānapekṣatvāditi sūtrakāreṇa yo hetu' svata' prāmāṇyasidhyarthamukta',
GSP28mimslovu:6713: tena codanānāmaprāmāṇye nirākṛte 'dhunā sambandhodbhavatvābhāvena paro bauddhādirmithyātvamuktavān /
GSP28mimslovu:6714: evaṃ ca tadā vārtikakāreṇa vṛttikāramatenātraiva svata' prāmāṇyaṃ vyutpādyamiti darśitam /
GSP28mimslovu:6715: tathā ca 'sūtrakāreṇa cocyata' iti punaruktiparihāre parata' paprāmāṇyoktairevākṣepahetubhi' pūrvapakṣo 'bhihita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6716: ihāpi ca bhāṣyakāreṇa 'brūta' ityucyate--- avabodhayati budhyamānasya nimittaṃ bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6719: naiva vāstyatra sambandha' kṛtako veti vakṣyate //5//
GSP28mimslovu:6723: codanāmithyārthanirāsārthaṃ hi sambamandhasadbhāvo nityatā ca heturukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:6732: anādṛtapratibandhastu yatkiñcid vidvān sa sarvaṃ jānīyādityatiprasajyata iti //4,5//
GSP28mimslovu:6733: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāvādaya' sambandhā' śabdasyānupapannā ityuktvā saṃśleṣasambandhabhāva eva darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:6741: evaṃ hi manyante--- na tāvad varṇā' śabda',
GSP28mimslovu:6744_0: ata eva gośabdatvādijātyasambhavāt bhūtādiviśeṣāṇāṃ ca pratiprayogamanyatvenāvācakatvād
GSP28mimslovu:6753: sa cāyamevambhūtor'tha' śabdena janyata eveti kāryakāraṇabhāvameva śabdārthayo' sambandhamātiṣṭhante /
GSP28mimslovu:6756: dṛṣṭā hi khalu mṛtsalilapracchannā api vrīhayo 'ṅkurādikāryamārabhamāṇā aviditasvarūpaśaktayo 'pīti sūktam--- asambhavena śeṣāṇāmiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6759: gaurayamiti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdopaśliṣṭamarthamavayanto laukikā dṛśyante /
GSP28mimslovu:6762: laukikāśca prāyeṇa saṃśleṣameva saṃbandhaṃ manyante iti sa eva sambandha' prasakko nirākārya ityāha--- tasminniti prāhāyena bhavati sa taddeśa eva dṛśyate rañjuriva ghaṭe,
GSP28mimslovu:6767: dvayaṃ vā parasparamasambaddhamitaretaradeśe tadanantaradeśe vādṛṣṭe' sādhyamityāha--- dvayamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:6768: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'syāccedarthena sambandha' kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhyasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām', ityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:6770: asyārtha'--- atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śabdārthayo' sambnadhasiddhyarthaṃ taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti heturantarṇīta',
GSP28mimslovu:6771: taṃ ca gaurayamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītibhramād yo nāmāsiddhaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6779: mukhaṃ ca tasya deśa iti kṣuramodakaśabdoccāraṇe mukhasya pāṭanapūraṇe syātām,
GSP28mimslovu:6780: na ca te sta'ṣa tasmānmodakādyarthakriyānupalambhācchabdadeśe taddeśānantarādṛṣṭeriti siddho hetu' /
GSP28mimslovu:6787: atrāyamabhiprāya'---- pratyāyyapratyāyakaśaktirūpo hi na' śabdārthayo' sambandho 'bhipreta', tad yadi
GSP28mimslovu:6792: yadi tu vācyavācakasambandhamevābhipretya na śabdār'thena saṅgata iti sādhyate tato laukikavirodha ityāha---vācyeti /
GSP28mimslovu:6800: tadya eva teṣāmanyatama' para' pratipādayitumabhipreto bhavati sa eva vācyavācakasambandhavarjitai' pratijñārthagaucarai' padai' pratipādayitumaśakya',
GSP28mimslovu:6801: ata' pratijñāṃ prayuñjānairāśrita' śabādarthayorvācyavācakalakṣaṇasambandha iti tanninirākaraṇe svavāgvirodha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6807: śabdānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā kartṛtvaṃ vā nirūpita' /
GSP28mimslovu:6810: asyārtha'--- ekasyāmabhidhānakriyāyāṃ śabda' karaṇaṃ kartā vā,
GSP28mimslovu:6815: nirūpita'--- sambandha iti vakṣyamāṇena sambandha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6816: yadvā--- ekasyāṃ gavādyarthapratipattau sādhyamānāyāmekena vaktropādīyamānāvaruṇaikahānīvadvivakṣitasāhityau śabdārtho yanniyamyete so 'nayo' sambandha ityāha--- pratipattāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:6818: upādeyasya hi viśeṣaṇaṃ vivakṣitaṃ bhavati śorivaikatvaṃ--- paśunā yajeteti /
GSP28mimslovu:6835: vyavahāradarśanāt anabhihitamapyarthaṃ jānāti tadā sthālyādīnāṃ vivakṣitaṃ sāhityaṃ manyate,
GSP28mimslovu:6837: evamihāpi bāla' prayojyavṛddhasya viviṣṭārthavyavahāradarśanena tadviṣayāṃ buddhimanumāya śabdānantarabhāvitayā śabdakāraṇatāṃ tādavavadhārayati /
GSP28mimslovu:6840_0: evaṃ ca viditvā svayamapi parārthaprayoge sahitau śabdārthau hṛdayamāveśitāvupādāya
GSP28mimslovu:6840_1: śabdaṃ coccārya parapratipattiṃ bhāvayatīti sūktaṃ sāhityavivakṣā varṇasāhityavivakṣāvaditi //12-13 1/2 //
GSP28mimslovu:6845: nanvevaṃ vadatā śabdārthayo' kriyāsambandha eva darśita',
GSP28mimslovu:6848: vakṣyati hi--- 'guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvādasambandha' samatvāt' iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6850: kriyākārakasambandhapūrvakatvāt sarvasambandhānāṃ kriyākārakasambandha eva darśita iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6851: astu tāvat, taduttarakālabhāvī tu ko 'nayo' sambandha iti vācyameva /
GSP28mimslovu:6855: tasyāṃ ca kriyākārakasambandhottarakālabhāvī parasparopakāryopakārakalakṣaṇa' śabdārthayorasti sambandha'//
GSP28mimslovu:6857: tathāhi --- atra tāvadekasyāṃ kriyāyāmupakāryopakārakatvaṃ śabdārthayo' sambandha ityuktam,
GSP28mimslovu:6867: ato vivecanīyamidam--- ko 'tra sambandha' śabdārthayorvārttikakārasyābhimata iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6871: na ca guṇena svamahimnā āśrayabhūtadravyamātramupādīyamānamapi kraye gṛhyate, (svakīyago)
GSP28mimslovu:6874: vacchedāt tad guṇamātramupādīyamānamapi krayakriyā na pratīcchati svakīyāruṇimaguṇāvarodhāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6879: śrūyatām--- artho hi na pratipādakamantareṇa pratipādyo bhavati,
GSP28mimslovu:6889: kartṛtvaṃ karaṇatvaṃ vā sambandha ityevamādaya' samullāpā' /
GSP28mimslovu:6893: na ca sadānīṃ tau na sta', nityatvāt /
GSP28mimslovu:6899: saṃjñeti gamakatvaṃ cenna tadaṅgamiyaṃ bhavet // Msv_5,9.16 //
GSP28mimslovu:6903: arthe ca pratipādyaśakti' ata eva sambandho nitya ityucyate /
GSP28mimslovu:6904: nanvemapi karahastādibhiranekai' śabdairekatrārthe pratipādye anekārthavacane caikasmin gavādiśabde kathamavyabhicāra' śakyate 'vagantum /
GSP28mimslovu:6905_0: ata' prakaraṇādīnāmapi padārthāvadhāraṇāpoyatvād vṛddhavyavahāre hi bālena kevalapadāprayogādāvāpoddhārabhedenaitadavadhāritam---
GSP28mimslovu:6905_1: yadā yadarthavivakṣayā śabda' prayujyate sa tasyārtha iti /
GSP28mimslovu:6910: tadevamarthaprakaraṇādibhedabhinnamanyayānyayā ca śaktyopahitamanyadanyacca padamanyasyānyasya vācakamiti na padavyabhicāra' /
GSP28mimslovu:6911: artho 'pi codbhūtatatpadābhidhānayogyāvasthābhedabhinno hastādiranyo 'nyaśac karādipadānāṃ vācya iti na padaṃ vyabhicarati /
GSP28mimslovu:6915: nanvevamekriyānimittako niyama' śabdārthayo' sambandha ityucyamāne 'numānāṅgamavinābhāva evāśrito bhavet,
GSP28mimslovu:6916: atastadabalena dhūmādivāgnijñānaṃ śabdādarthajñānamupajāyamānamanumānaṃ syādata āha---na cāpīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6928: sānaṅgaṃ tadvadeva syānneyaṃ dhūmādibhi' samā // Msv_5,9.18 //
GSP28mimslovu:6930: gamakatvena pūrvaṃ ca tatra notpadyate mati' // Msv_5,9.19 //
GSP28mimslovu:6932: yadaiva ceha sambandhaṃ vṛddhebhya' pratipādyate // Msv_5,9.20 //
GSP28mimslovu:6943: yathaivāvinanābhāva eva dhūmādau pratītyaṅgaṃ na taduttarakālabhāvi gamakatvam,
GSP28mimslovu:6947: tatra hi dhūmādau mahānasādideśe 'gnyavinābhāvanirūpaṇottarakālaṃ tatkṛtaivāsau gamakateti /
GSP28mimslovu:6948: api ca dhūme prathamaṃ gamakatvaṃ nāvagamyata ityāha -- gamakatveneti //19//
GSP28mimslovu:6950: gamakatvenaiva śabde prathamaṃ vyutpattirityuktaṃ tad vivṛṇoti---kathayantītitrayeṇa /
GSP28mimslovu:6954: tathāha--- vṛddhopadeśe tāvadayamasya vācya' ayamasya vācaka
GSP28mimslovu:6959: itthaṃ vācakatā siddhā saṅkīrṇāpi tata' param // Msv_5,9.24 //
GSP28mimslovu:6965: yatrāpi kvaciduccaritād vākyāt prayojyavṛddhasyārthāviṣayāṃ kriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā ceṣṭānumānena gavādyarthaboddhṛtvamupakalpyate tatrāpi yasmādata' śabdādanenāyamartho 'vagata',
GSP28mimslovu:6967_0: prasiddhapadāntarasamabhivyāhāre 'pi iha sahakāratarau madhuraṃ piko rautītyevamādau
GSP28mimslovu:6967_1: viditasahākarādādyartho 'viditapikādyarthaśca yo 'yaṃ sahakāratarau rauti tasya pikaśabdo
GSP28mimslovu:6967_2: gamaka iti gamakatvamevāvagacchatīti siddhaṃ sarvatra gamakatvaṃ na vyutpattiriti //21-23 1/2 //
GSP28mimslovu:6976: na ca tān pratyavacākā' śabdā iti yuktaṃ vaktum /
GSP28mimslovu:6988: tena tarhi kimarthaṃ vivañcate ata āha--balābalādīti /
GSP28mimslovu:6989: śāstrasthā hyanirūpitaśaktayo na śāstrārthamanuṣṭhātuṃ śaknuvantīti teṣāṃ hānopādānopayogī śabdaśaktiviveka iti te viviñcata iti //26 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:6997: tatra ca sāmānyaviśeṣā' sāmānyaśabdasya svārthena kakṣyayāntaritā bhavanti /
GSP28mimslovu:6998: yathā sacchabdasya sattāmācakṣāṇasya tadantaritā dravyatvādaya' sāmānyaviśeṣā',
GSP28mimslovu:6999: teṣu cāsau lakṣaṇābalena pravartamāno durbalo jāyate /
GSP28mimslovu:7000: svarthe tu śrutyā vartate iti sa tatra balavān /
GSP28mimslovu:7001: kā punariyaṃ lakṣaṇā nāma--- abhidheyavinābhāvena pratīti' /
GSP28mimslovu:7004: kriyā kiyadvābhidheyāvinābhāvena lakṣyate kiyat svamahimnā śabdenocyata iti śāstrasthānāmanuṣṭhānaviśeṣārthaṃ viveko yukta' /
GSP28mimslovu:7005: sā ca lakṣaṇā prāyeṇa nityasambandhād bhavatīti nityasambandhādityuktam /
GSP28mimslovu:7012_0: ṇebhyo dadhi dīyatāṃ takraṃ kauṇḍinyāyeti brāhmaṇasāmānyasthā brāhmaṇaśrutirlakṣamayā
GSP28mimslovu:7012_1: tadviśeṣaṃ kauṇḍinyamavatarantī durbalā bhavati ityavyavahitaviśeṣasthayā kauṇḍinyaśrutyā bādhyate /
GSP28mimslovu:7014: yaju' sāmānyasthā 'upāṃśuyajuṣā'iti śrutistadviśeṣasthayā 'uccairnigadena' iti śrutyā bādhyata ityevamādi darśayitavyamiti /
GSP28mimslovu:7015: sāmānyaśabdenātra viśeṣān viśiṃṣanna sāmānyatiriktā' kecana viśeṣā vidyanta iti darśayati /
GSP28mimslovu:7016: asati hi keṣāñcid darśanaṃ-- nityadravyavṛttayo 'ntyā viśeṣā' /
GSP28mimslovu:7017: te ca vyāvṛttibuddhereva hetutvād viśeṣā eveti /
GSP28mimslovu:7018: paramāṇukārayamakaṃ hi kāṇādā dvyaṇukādikrameṇa jagato nirmāṇamātiṣṭhante /
GSP28mimslovu:7020: ata' santi kecanāṇusamavāyino viśeṣā nāma ye tānitaretarato vyāvartayantīti saṅgirante /
GSP28mimslovu:7027: śiṃśapātvena śiṃśapā vṛkṣāntarebhya ityevamaṇūn yāvadiya viśeṣakathā vartayitavyā /
GSP28mimslovu:7031: pṛthaktvākhyo vā guṇasteṣāmanyonyasya viśeṣakatvād viśeṣo bhaviṣyati /
GSP28mimslovu:7036: yoginastu tān paśyantīti śraddhadhānā budhyante vayamaśraddhadhānā' sma',
GSP28mimslovu:7037: ye yuktiṃ prārthayāmaha iti sūktaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣeṣviti //27-28 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:7050: gośabdasya bahulaṃ prayogāt tadviśeṣeṣu ca śābaleyādiṣu asatsvapi bāhuleyādiṣu proya(gā?ga)
GSP28mimslovu:7051_0: darśanāt parasāmānye ca sattādau satyapi bhāvāntare 'prayogāt sāsnādibhi' sahaikāvayavirūpārthasamnabdhigotvamātrasya
GSP28mimslovu:7051_1: gośabdo vācaka ityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñānaṃ janyate sāsnādyekārthasambandhīti cāvinābhāvinā
GSP28mimslovu:7052: ata' siddhaṃ gamyagamakabhāva eva śabdārthayo' sambandha' prathamamavagamyate na punaravinābhāva iti //29-30 1/2//
GSP28mimslovu:7055: na ca gamakaṃ saṃjñeti laukikā manyante,
GSP28mimslovu:7076: devadattādayo hi yadṛcchāśabdā yatraiva saṅketyate tameva pratīpādayanti /
GSP28mimslovu:7083_0: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa 'yadi pratyāyaka' śabda' prathamaśruta' kiṃ na pratyāyayati' iti
GSP28mimslovu:7083_1: paricodya 'sarvatra no darśanaṃ pramāṇam' ityādinā darśanabalena gṛhītaśaktika' pratyāyayatīti parihāra ukta',
GSP28mimslovu:7089: syādetat--- prakāśakā' pradīpādayo 'viditasambandhā api svārthaṃ prakāśayanto dṛśyante,
GSP28mimslovu:7098: api ca vrīhyādayo 'gṛgītasvarūpā api kāryamārabhanta eveti śabde taddharma' kiṃ nāropyate /
GSP28mimslovu:7102: kena vedamājñāpitaṃ jñāpakena svarūpagrahaṇamapekṣitavyaṃ na sambandhagrahaṇamiti,
GSP28mimslovu:7108: na hi tatkāṇaṃ loke vede vā kiñcidīdṛśam /
GSP28mimslovu:7111: bāhyāntaravibhāgena kvacit syād vā vivakṣayā // Msv_5,9.38 //
GSP28mimslovu:7113: kiṃ cakṣuṣā mamaitena dṛṣṭaṃ dīpena yanmayā // Msv_5,9.39 //
GSP28mimslovu:7114: kṣāyāmapi, darśanabalādeva hi liṅgaśabdādayo jñāpakaviśeṣā' sambandhagrahaṇamapekṣante /
GSP28mimslovu:7120: nanu ca sambandhagrahaṇāt prāgapyabhidhāne śabda' śakto na vā /
GSP28mimslovu:7128: yadi hyanugrāhakāpekṣā svaśaktiṃ vihanyāt sarvameva laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ karaṇaṃ karaṇatāṃ jahyāt /
GSP28mimslovu:7130: kiñca--- astu tāvaditikartavyatāpekṣā karaṇabhāvaṃ na vihantīti,
GSP28mimslovu:7134: ata āha--- bāhyāntareti bāhyamapi kvacid vivakṣāta' kārakapravṛtte' karaṇatayā vivakṣyata ityāha--- kvacitsyādveti //38//
GSP28mimslovu:7141: gauravāt karaṇatvena mataṃ cet kena vāryate // Msv_5,9.42 //
GSP28mimslovu:7146: kintu kitaścittāratamyaviśeṣād bāhyameva pradīpaṃ karaṇatayā vivakṣatīti //39//
GSP28mimslovu:7148: nityavṛttau nityaṃ tu kāryasiddhau āntarasya takṣuṣa' karaṇatvamavagamyata ityāha---nityavṛttāviti /
GSP28mimslovu:7152: ata' kathaṃ tadapekṣayā cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha---śarīreti /
GSP28mimslovu:7156_0: ātmamana' saṃyogo hi rasādijñānasādhāraṇo nāvyabhicāritayā rūpadarśanakāraṇamiti
GSP28mimslovu:7158: anena yattadāgamanyāyena sambandhagrahaṇameva kāraṇamāpadyetetyuktaṃ tadapi vivakṣāviśeṣavaśenāstviti darśitamiti //42//
GSP28mimslovu:7159: aparamapi--- 'yathā cakṣurdraṣṭṭana bāhyena prakāśena vinā' ityādi parihārabhāṣyaṃ,
GSP28mimslovu:7166: ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa ceṣṭaśced dhruvaṃ kṛta' // Msv_5,9.45 //
GSP28mimslovu:7168: samaṃ nāstyanayo' kiñcit tenāsaṅgatatā svata' // Msv_5,9.46 //
GSP28mimslovu:7171: yadṛcchāśabdānāmapi jñānasāmarthyaṃ vidyamānameva niyogenābhivyajyata ityadhyāsavāde varṇitam /
GSP28mimslovu:7172: atra ca yathā cakṣuriti bhāṣye cakṣuṣa' karaṇatvamityatropapattimāha---prakāśaiti /
GSP28mimslovu:7174: tadevamupapādita' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' kṛtakatvena bhāṣyakṛtākṣipta'--- 'yadi prathamaśruto na pratyāyayati kṛtakastarhi' iti,
GSP28mimslovu:7176: evaṃ cātra prayoga'--- ya' saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandha' sa kṛtaka',
GSP28mimslovu:7181: ayamartha'--- yathā rajjusarpādiṣu bhinnadeśakālādhiṣṭhāneṣu kiñcid deśādi samaṃ nāsti,
